95a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang
95a4(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
95a5(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ma ga d+hA
95a6(mdo sde): na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to// de'i tshe gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram nas thag mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ral du gyur pa/ rlung dang
95a7(mdo sde): chen gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
95b1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas can dang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas can dan ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags
95b2(mdo sde): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas can dan ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun
95b3(mdo sde): pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
95b4(mdo sde): dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos
95b5(mdo sde): gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu rim shing dang
95b6(mdo sde): ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ches bzhin du rgyal po byed do// de bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku
95b7(mdo sde): be ra dang / brgya byi nang nge/ tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di sa ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang
96a1(mdo sde): lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i sgra dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i sgra dang / chos dang mthur pa dang / rtag tu byi bzhin 'brang bani/
96a2(mdo sde): lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te
96a3(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs
96a4(mdo sde): pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas
96a5(mdo sde): 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad
96a6(mdo sde): las 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal pos kyang
96a7(mdo sde): pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o// byis re zhig na nyim 'char kar 'adz+ra de 'bye nasapadz+ra de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes pa/ mdog
96b1(mdo sde): bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ sna legs pa/ smin ma stug pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i
96b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ de'i kha nas ni pad+ma'i dri 'byung la/
96b3(mdo sde): lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo // de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong nas/
96b4(mdo sde): khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/ ya ba tshur gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i sras lags so// de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas smras pa/
96b5(mdo sde): bu de ni khyod skad zer ba bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/ pad+ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te lag par bzhag go// de nas khye'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa bzhag
96b6(mdo sde): pa de dang der pad+ma dag byung ngo // de nas de'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so// gang gi tshe khye'u tsan dan khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol
96b7(mdo sde): pa lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/ lha sras can dan gtang ba'i rigs so// 'on tang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la/ gnas thams cad/
97a1(mdo sde): u / sa
97a2(mdo sde): 'khor dadung bcas pa/ ram ma'i zla rnam pa tshogs byed cing / zung zhi dus na ra bya ba'i phyir/ rgyas pa'i zanganas rgyuro tugyu // dedas da
97a3(mdo sde): gom pa re re la pad+ma bag+h+nA na sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/ de dag nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyis shing skam mo// de nas sems can dag pa/ bsam pa dge ba
97a4(mdo sde): sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa des de mthong nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ dzaM sar bad+ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'jug la/ nyi ma'i 'od zer
97a5(mdo sde): gyis gdungs pas na chis shing rnam par 'gyur ba de bzhin su/ sras 'di yang de dang 'dra' stsa lo// des de skar sems shing 'jam la nye bar rtog pa nA/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang thun
97a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so// de nas re zhig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
97a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te/ de dag bgos nas nam mkha' la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/ de mthong bas rgyal po dang / blon po dang
97b1(mdo sde): grong rdas gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' chen po thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rang sangs
97b2(mdo sde): rgyas can dan ni de las byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so// dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rang sangs rgyas can dan gyis las gang
97b3(mdo sde): dag bgyis shing bsags na/ 'di'i lus kyang dri bda' la dbang po yang rno bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la
97b4(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/ des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul/ me tog dag kyang btags te/ der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms
97b5(mdo sde): so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas//
97b6(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
97b7(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / pad+ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
98a1(mdo sde): po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
98a2(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas// mchod
98a3(mdo sde): bo byas te// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
98a4(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/
98a5(mdo sde): ba mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/
98a6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra bi'i srungs ma rnams kyis pad+ma dgra blangs te/ srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams
98a7(mdo sde): nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so// bud med zhig kyang rkye mu ga pa pan thogs te/ srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
98b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba/
98b2(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ glo tor du lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs pa las pad+ma blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul bor ro//
98b3(mdo sde): de das pasgyur shing d+ha'i 'brang ba rnas gyur te/ gleng gi ma ma la sa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs nam la/ gnas na sdud // denas bcom thar mas kyis 'jar
98b4(mdo sde): ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dge bkye nas/ des mnyan du yod du pa ril gyis snang bar byas so// rgyu des na rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par byas so//
98b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
98b6(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang
98b7(mdo sde): thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang /
99a1(mdo sde): kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltarags pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa/
99a2(mdo sde): de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur
99a3(mdo sde): to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul/
99a4(mdo sde): pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma
99a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i sems can sdang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal
99a6(mdo sde): ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal
99a7(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs
99b1(mdo sde): ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dod pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang /
99b2(mdo sde): tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom sdang rnams
99b3(mdo sde): dang shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa
99b4(mdo sde): gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang
99b5(mdo sde): zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis/
99b6(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom
99b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
100a1(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par
100a2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston
100a3(mdo sde): ba ra bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar
100a4(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
100a5(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
100a6(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
100a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang
100b1(mdo sde): par bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes sbya sa pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro bdag gi dam pani
100b2(mdo sde): rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// bstan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge slong
100b3(mdo sde): rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal pa rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta
100b4(mdo sde): bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gis don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/
100b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
100b6(mdo sde): rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la pad+ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo
100b7(mdo sde): khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du logs par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su
101a1(mdo sde): myong nas/ rang sangs rgyas brda'i tha ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang ngas sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yid do// dge song dan bsan
101a2(mdo sde): bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
101a3(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po
101a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
101a5(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas
101a6(mdo sde): ti/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyir dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams/
101a7(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab kyi
101b1(mdo sde): 'od ma'i tshal byA ka lan tra ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyam po'i khab nas ded dpom zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/ de'i chung ma yang tshol bab pa de khyim thab la/
101b2(mdo sde): gdung zhing / yongs su yi chad la/ smre sngags 'don kyang / de'i khyim zab ma 'ongs nas des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te dam bcas pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag
101b3(mdo sde): gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes byas so// de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te/ nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs so// de nas des gser gyi 'khor
101b4(mdo sde): lo byed du bcug ste/ de bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor bas/ 'khor lo dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas
101b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
101b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa
101b7(mdo sde): gsum sdang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthis shin
102a1(mdo sde): tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po
102a2(mdo sde): sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug
102a3(mdo sde): la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa
102a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi
102a5(mdo sde): spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar / su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang /
102a6(mdo sde): gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan sang nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya//
102a7(mdo sde): su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
102b1(mdo sde): rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs/
102b2(mdo sde): pa 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//
102b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo des nga mthong na/ rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs
102b4(mdo sde): dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la
102b5(mdo sde): gshegs so// de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od
102b6(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // de nas mthong ba'i mang la dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan
102b7(mdo sde): 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so// de nas bran mos bkag ste/ 'di sred med kyi bu ma yin zhes byas so// 'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur nas
103a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gser gyi 'khor mo bor ro// spos dang / bdug pa dang ka me tog kyang phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
103a2(mdo sde): kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
103a3(mdo sde): dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus
103a4(mdo sde): 'jom sa dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / che ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so tha mas thams dang / kyi hud zer dang
103a5(mdo sde): a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ che ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab
103a6(mdo sde): po/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du
103a7(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sama'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag
103b1(mdo sde): gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can sngang
103b2(mdo sde): ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar
103b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen
103b4(mdo sde): bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs
103b5(mdo sde): ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / ched med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams
103b6(mdo sde): dang ched med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang /
103b7(mdo sde): gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so//
104a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// ga'adam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//
104a2(mdo sde): 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/
104a3(mdo sde): zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das
104a4(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar
104a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar
104a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung bai re bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs
104a7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston pa rabazhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i
104b1(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhas du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro//
104b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i
104b3(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to//
104b4(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs
104b5(mdo sde): rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag
104b6(mdo sde): gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge
104b7(mdo sde): slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'chel ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri lta bur brtan pa
105a1(mdo sde): yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/
105a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
105a3(mdo sde): rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge
105a4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par lhung bar mi 'gyur te lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas
105a5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang ngal sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas
105a6(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs
105a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po
105b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams/
105b2(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
105b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal
105b4(mdo sde): zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyed pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram
105b5(mdo sde): du byon to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi chen gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
105b6(mdo sde): btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas
105b7(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang / ming ci las
106a1(mdo sde): btags pa nyan par 'dod dmagasol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid lazung zhig dang /
106a2(mdo sde): ngas ba shad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA ra NA si ma/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /
106a3(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang /
106a4(mdo sde): nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug go// rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig ste/ chos bzhin du rgyal po
106a5(mdo sde): byed do// de nas rgyal po de bu med nas bu 'dod de/ gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs
106a6(mdo sde): te ta'adi lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang
106a7(mdo sde): mthun pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod
106b1(mdo sde): kyi/ de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i/
106b2(mdo sde): rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu ma skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa/
106b3(mdo sde): dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de yang gsol ba 'debs pa skur byed cing 'dug la/ de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ut+pa la
106b4(mdo sde): dang pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ 'gram ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / zal mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma
106b5(mdo sde): tshad las 'das par che ba zhig blo tor du skyes te/ de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la/ kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas
106b6(mdo sde): rgyal pos kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o// phyis re zhig ni nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bye nas/ pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
106b7(mdo sde): mdog bzang ba/ gser gyi kha dog can/ mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sna mtho ba/ snga legs pa/ smin ma sdug pa/ lus skyes bu chen
107a1(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/ kun dga'/
107a2(mdo sde): ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po sa thos nas/ blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong ste/ pad+ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes shing
107a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/ yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u de blangs te bkur sti chen
107a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/ zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bcas ston rgyas par byas nas
107a5(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so// de nas khye'u mgo bcu pa pang na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma
107a6(mdo sde): gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis
107a7(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa
107b1(mdo sde): snying rje che ba bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/ des yab rgyal sa na 'dug pa na/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i las dag byed pa
107b2(mdo sde): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/ yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so//
107b3(mdo sde): yab kyis kyang gnang ste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos tshon can bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas des lung mnos pa med par
107b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas nam mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna
107b5(mdo sde): tshogs bstan to// de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so// de nas de lus thogs pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin
107b6(mdo sde): du mya ngan las 'das par song ste/ de'i mchod 'di yin no// de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
107b7(mdo sde): btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang dag bgyis na/ ma'i mngal du ma skyes te/ pad+ma las skyes lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid
108a1(mdo sde): sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na
108a2(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
108a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams//
108a4(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du/
108a5(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
108a6(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam/
108a7(mdo sde): par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/ rgyal po pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang
108b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge 'dun gyis mdun du/
108b2(mdo sde): bdar nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so// ded nga dpon zhig kyang pad+ma khyer te srang du zhugs so// de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
108b3(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhags pa'i 'od mnga'
108b4(mdo sde): berin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/ bor ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i 'phang
108b5(mdo sde): lo tsam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/ gzhes na ni sdod do// de nas re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang chub tu
108b6(mdo sde): lung bstan to// de nas dga' zhing mgul rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang / de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu bca' zhing 'dug ste/ skad ngan thon nas/ des bran mo la de ci zhig
108b7(mdo sde): ces dris so// des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do// de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag nams kyang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig ces
109a1(mdo sde): byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du mur pa gang yin pa de ni rang
109a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du rnams kyang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/ srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to// /
109a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkuri sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
109a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mdog 'jam
109a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang
109a6(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
109a7(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod po byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
109b1(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa kA na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang
109b2(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
109b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ nor dang yo byad mang ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs mang
109b4(mdo sde): ba zhig yod de/ khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsams pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod
109b5(mdo sde): ba zhig go// de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan
109b6(mdo sde): mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i
109b7(mdo sde): khrus gsol la zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol ba dang / gdugs tshod gsol
110a1(mdo sde): bar spyan drangs so// de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te
110a2(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so// de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro khang du song nas/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das
110a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des bcom ldan
110a4(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi log nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca'
110a5(mdo sde): ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa shos gsol zin te/ bsang sder ni gyur/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas
110a6(mdo sde): stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
110a7(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag
110b1(mdo sde): par gzengs bstod/ yang bar dag dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsu ba nas bcang ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nungs/
110b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi
110b3(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//
110b4(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang /
110b5(mdo sde): mnar med pa dang / chu bu ra can dang / chu bu ra rdol dang so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma lta
110b6(mdo sde): gas pa chen por song nas/ che ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//
110b7(mdo sde): des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam
111a1(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag
111a2(mdo sde): cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar
111a3(mdo sde): gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa
111a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
111a5(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /
111a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang //
111a7(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong /
111b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
111b2(mdo sde): kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdug sde ni gzhom par gyis//
111b3(mdo sde): gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab sbyangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do//
111b4(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i
111b5(mdo sde): las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur/
111b6(mdo sde): ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang
111b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar
112a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por/
112a2(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
112a3(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
112a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
112a5(mdo sde): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs
112a6(mdo sde): can/ mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang
112a7(mdo sde): bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni chu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum
112b1(mdo sde): mi ston/ brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge slong rgyal dang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang / bzang po dag/
112b2(mdo sde): gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa
112b3(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal che mnyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshes
112b4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam
112b5(mdo sde): btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes
112b6(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas
112b7(mdo sde): dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
113a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'od bsil zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / zlon
113a2(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
113a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang /
113a4(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
113a5(mdo sde): ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na
113a6(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ khyim bdag phyung cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/
113a7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la
113b1(mdo sde): bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas de 'di skam du sems te/ longs spyod 'di dag
113b2(mdo sde): ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/ mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug pa ma yin pa/ yid brtan tu mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ gnod pa chen po
113b3(mdo sde): lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/ bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das
113b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ khyim yang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas te/ cen dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ spos sna tshogs
113b5(mdo sde): kyi snod ni bkram/ dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/ me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/ me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so// de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang /
113b6(mdo sde): 'khur ba dang / bshos rnams kyang sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs la bab ste/ bshos lags na/ bcom
113b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/ gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams
114a1(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge
114a2(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ rang gi lag nas bza'
114a3(mdo sde): ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed/
114a4(mdo sde): pa bstabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ gsang sder ni gru/ phyag ni bcas par rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
114a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod//
114a6(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar
114a7(mdo sde): mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas khyim bdag de dad brnyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan
114b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
114b2(mdo sde): dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus
114b3(mdo sde): 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu che ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer
114b4(mdo sde): dang / a chu zer dang / ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltarags pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar
114b5(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas
114b6(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed
114b7(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung
115a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur/
115a2(mdo sde): nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to// steng du
115a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul/
115a4(mdo sde): dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal
115a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang ka dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams
115a6(mdo sde): dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
115a7(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsams par gyis/ sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim
115b1(mdo sde): la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal
115b2(mdo sde): zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang
115b3(mdo sde): stegal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni//
115b4(mdo sde): mdur logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na
115b5(mdo sde): zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo/
115b6(mdo sde): gnyis su mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
115b7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed nade/ lte bar mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung gyur
116a1(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//
116a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni// dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
116a3(mdo sde): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi sdang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la nus pa
116a4(mdo sde): tshon rdza stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshig
116a5(mdo sde): su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//
116a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung
116a7(mdo sde): mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang
116b1(mdo sde): gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chemanyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te
116b2(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i
116b3(mdo sde): bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/
116b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas
116b5(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
116b6(mdo sde): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po
116b7(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
117a1(mdo sde): sa ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / sgro 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas// mchod pa/
117a2(mdo sde): byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
117a3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ma
117a4(mdo sde): ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
117a5(mdo sde): mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa rnams gal ba der gshegs te byon nas/ mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig/ mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol
117a6(mdo sde): pa grub ces stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du srung
117a7(mdo sde): ba las bskal/ sor 'phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor srung ba las bsgral/ bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa ni/ nga rgyal gyi rgya mtshor srung ba las bsgral/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ni gti mug gi rgya
117b1(mdo sde): mcho srung ba las bzlas te/ 'a kya ngas sgra bcas ma rdzangs so// de gad ces bka' sal kyang bsdus par las mgrangs so// de nas matar bzhigags com ldan 'dus na/
117b2(mdo sde): brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de yang mthong nas dang bskyes te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das can thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bslus par 'tshal mo zhes gsol so/
117b3(mdo sde): de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to// de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de
117b4(mdo sde): mthong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa zhig rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bston te/ mnyan pa des de thos
117b5(mdo sde): nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan
117b6(mdo sde): gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang / mtho ris
117b7(mdo sde): dang / thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang
118a1(mdo sde): ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so//
118a2(mdo sde): yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
118a3(mdo sde): gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go
118a4(mdo sde): 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba las// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//
118a5(mdo sde): de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
118a6(mdo sde): pa bshos gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe//
118a7(mdo sde): zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni
118b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / dra 'bod dang / dra 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bu ca /
118b2(mdo sde): rgyu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a mu Te dang / ut+pal lta gas pa dang / badz+ra sur gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dumyal ba gang
118b3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
118b4(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa skyes pa'i
118b5(mdo sde): phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yang
118b6(mdo sde): ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon
118b7(mdo sde): par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par
119a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan
119a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /
119a3(mdo sde): 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod
119a4(mdo sde): nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du
119a5(mdo sde): song nas/ mi rtag dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/
119a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//
119a7(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas
119b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi sdang bar 'gyur ro//
119b2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang 'gyur ro//
119b3(mdo sde): dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye
119b4(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar
119b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar
119b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mchems kyi mdzod spur mi
119b7(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan
120a1(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
120a2(mdo sde): bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/
120a3(mdo sde): nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//
120a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/ dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan bsom
120a5(mdo sde): 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgyal mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lnga bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs
120a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi na 'da' 'dzum mi ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
120a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//
120b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos
120b2(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas
120b3(mdo sde): na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
120b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
120b5(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnam
120b6(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas
120b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
121a1(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes dang / nyan thos
121a2(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa'i yul mi rnams kyi lugs kyis na
121a3(mdo sde): phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus skud par byed do// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de/ tsan ngan
121a4(mdo sde): dmar po zhig bdar zhing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi
121a5(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
121a6(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas/
121a7(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po skyes so// de nas de dang pa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas bcom ldan
121b1(mdo sde): 'das la bkur sti byed mi nus na/ bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo// de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/ lag pa gnyis ka cen ngan dmar pos byugs nas/ bcom
121b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan daran gyi dris gang bar mdzad do// de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de
121b3(mdo sde): mthong nas/ sems dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ sems la rtas par byas te/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya/
121b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni
121b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ni 'og
121b6(mdo sde): tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang /
121b7(mdo sde): che ba dang / rab tu che ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang ka ut+pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar
122a1(mdo sde): gas pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ che ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can
122a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag/
122a3(mdo sde): cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do// de dag gis sprul pa
122a4(mdo sde): mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/ gzhan du yong ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can sdang ba 'di'i mthus
122a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de
122a6(mdo sde): zad de/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
122a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams
122b1(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med/
122b2(mdo sde): dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang
122b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs
122b4(mdo sde): su bcad ba gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
122b5(mdo sde): par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes rjod par byed do// /
122b6(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las
122b7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems
123a1(mdo sde): can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par
123a2(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su mi
123a3(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
123a4(mdo sde): ston par bzhad na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
123a5(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/ zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag
123a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te
123a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi sdang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ tshon sna stong
123b1(mdo sde): gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su
123b2(mdo sde): bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//
123b3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston// brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni
123b4(mdo sde): gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mi
123b5(mdo sde): ston// gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de ni
123b6(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis pa
123b7(mdo sde): la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
124a1(mdo sde): ba 'dis/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngang ldang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang dus sems dang par byas pa 'di
124a2(mdo sde): yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyer kyis de ltar bslab par
124a3(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
124a4(mdo sde): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong
124a5(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / s+ho
124a6(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
124a7(mdo sde): lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang /
124b1(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa nA/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
