183a2(mdo sde): mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas
183a3(mdo sde): bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
183a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
183a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na brten cing bzhugs pa na/ der dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas
183a6(mdo sde): de skom gyis gdungs te/ khron pa'i drung du song nas/ de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa la dge slong des smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs kyis/ chu byin cig ces
183a7(mdo sde): byas na/ yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa de ser sna skyes nas dge slong de la smras pa/ dge slong bdag gi bum pa 'gribs su 'ong gis/ gal te khyod shi na'ang chu mi sbyin no zhes byas so//
183b1(mdo sde): de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs bzhin du re thag chad nas song ngo // de nas bu mo de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa de lta bu sa shi nas yi dgas su skyes te/ de lta bu'i
183b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spangs par bya ba'i
183b3(mdo sde): phyir brtson par bya'o zhes mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang /
183b4(mdo sde): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
183b5(mdo sde): phyi sa'i snod ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
183b6(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang
183b7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
184a1(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzim
184a2(mdo sde): cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tsha la bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na brten cing bzhugs so//
184a3(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sha ma thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu
184a4(mdo sde): bsod snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
184a5(mdo sde): 'dzegs te/ nyin par gnas pa'i phyir shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sa yi dgas mo sdong du ma me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug
184a6(mdo sde): cing rang gi sgras yog pa/ lho ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i
184a7(mdo sde): skad 'byir la/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba phyis bzhin du dring zhing mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyis za la/ de'ang bde/
184b1(mdo sde): brag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ yi dgas mo la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'jig
184b2(mdo sde): bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig/
184b3(mdo sde): dang / des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
184b4(mdo sde): chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos
184b5(mdo sde): ro dang ldan no cog ston to// 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
184b6(mdo sde): rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung batshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te ka der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
184b7(mdo sde): gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni
185a1(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la gcer bur mchis shing rang gi sbas yog pa/ lho ni ri tsa ma la
185a2(mdo sde): kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu wa ba ra nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag po dang
185a3(mdo sde): mi bzad pa dang / che ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang / des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe steng du/
185a4(mdo sde): me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang / phyi sa bzhin dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba/ zas su phyi sa za ba 'tshal la/ de'ang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so// yang
185a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par byed// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa// der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid// phyi sa bza' 'am
185a6(mdo sde): btung snyam mo// de'ang bde brag rnyed mi 'gyur// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na// des na sdig pa 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba nyams su myong //
185a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so//
185b1(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas pa shad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing
185b2(mdo sde): 'phongs pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig yod la de'ang nad bu can zhig ste/ wA rA tI sir bsod snyoms la song ngo // re zhig na de la spen pas
185b3(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i zas bstan nas/ de tshong dpon zhig ga la 'dug pa der song ba dang / tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/ de smras pa/ 'thun pa'i kha zas
185b4(mdo sde): 'dod do// de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o// de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/ gal te bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas byin
185b5(mdo sde): du zin na/ sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ phyogs gcig tu song ste/ lhung bzed phyi sas bkang nas/ steng 'bras chan gyis bkab ste/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo//
185b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/ des blangs so// blangs nas tshor te/ 'di dri nga ba las na 'dis phyi sas bkang gor
185b7(mdo sde): ma chag go snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid chen po des gzhig tu bor nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
186a1(mdo sde): natshong dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des sdig pa'i las de lta bu byas nas/ de phyin chad rtag tu sems can
186a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes te/ rtag tu zas su phyis za bar gyur to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste ga ci nas yi
186a3(mdo sde): dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
186a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom
186a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon
186a6(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
186a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas ka mchod/
186b1(mdo sde): ba byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
186b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
186b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol 'od ma'i tshal gyi ni tshu rol
186b4(mdo sde): de'i bar skabs na yi dgas sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa lho ni ri tsam ya/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste ga'abar zhing rab tu 'bar la
186b5(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/ tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / che ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshe
186b6(mdo sde): ba nyams su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te/ gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
186b7(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ba dang / des yi dgas de dag mthong ngo // yi dgas de dag gis kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal
187a1(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po mthong ngo // de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste/ phyi nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug/
187a2(mdo sde): skad zer la gti zhing smra bas 'thun par smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/ bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad
187a3(mdo sde): rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/ bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/ gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la yang bgegs byas so// sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang yi
187a4(mdo sde): dgas kyi tshig lta bus mang du spyos te/ khyod ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so// des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dgas su skyes so// /
187a5(mdo sde): btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bas na/ bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par shes par mdzad la dad pa dris te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa
187a6(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/ bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye gnas las thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig/ de nas
187a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus kyang yi dgas rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim du dad pa dris nas/ phyid nyin
187b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun pashos la spyan drangs so// yi dgas rnams la'ang sbran te/ sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs
187b2(mdo sde): kyis/ khyed kyang der shog cig ces byas so// de dag gi nye du rnams la'ang khyed kyang shog cig dang / nye du'i mchod rten byed pa der yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so//
187b3(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu nyid mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so// de nas nam nangs nas zhal zas bshams te/ gdugs tshod la bab na yi dgas de dag mi snang ngo //
187b4(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis yi dgas de dag bsams na/ yul ma ga d+ha thog thag na'ang mi snang ngo // mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na'ang mi snang ngo //
187b5(mdo sde): de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de ji srid du bltas kyang de na'ang mi snang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
187b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu mthong la/ khyod mi dgar ma byed cig/ nyan thos dang
187b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/ de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang mo'u 'gal gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs
188a1(mdo sde): pa'i stobs la ltos shig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'ang bstan gyis
188a2(mdo sde): gaN+DI rdungs shig/ de nas gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/ yi dgas kyi nye du rnams dang yi dgas mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang
188a3(mdo sde): lhad mo la lpags te 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas yi dgas rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur/
188a4(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to//
188a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin sngo// yi dgas 'jig rten rab
188a6(mdo sde): 'jigs la// de dag myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten te/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum
188a7(mdo sde): phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur to// yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
188b1(mdo sde): skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo//
188b2(mdo sde): de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi
188b3(mdo sde): dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems bdag cag zhag lon te gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par
188b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul par thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa
188b5(mdo sde): nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur ku ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /
188b6(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das
188b7(mdo sde): la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
189a1(mdo sde): bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/
189a2(mdo sde): khyad par chen po thob bo// de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/
189a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dgas mang po dag lha'i nang du bkod nas/ de drag kyang ma dang sum pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ de dag la ngas
189a4(mdo sde): chos bstan nas/ de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mtho bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba de ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/ legs so legs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
189a5(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la'ang shes par byas te/ de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur
189a6(mdo sde): spyi byas so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ci na yi dgas de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
189a7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag
189b1(mdo sde): kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// chu smad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang /
189b2(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin dus/
189b3(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/
189b4(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
189b5(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
189b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tsha la bya ke lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba
189b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang
190a1(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nus/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /
190a2(mdo sde): bu byung ste/ khye'u zhig bcas nas/ de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu
190a3(mdo sde): smad la btsas pas na/ de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas/ de'i ming chu smad ces btags so// de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de'i pha shi
190a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to// de nas des tshong dus bkram nas nyo tshong byed cing nyo tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las/ de'i nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
190a5(mdo sde): song ste/ de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos thos pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas/ de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/ des ma la
190a6(mdo sde): gsol ba btab pa/ yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig/ de nas de'i mas smras pa/ bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin gyis
190a7(mdo sde): bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rab tu ma 'byung zhig/ bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bye ba byos shig ces zer ro// chu smang des kyang ji stod pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/ yum 'dis/
190b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so// de'i mde brkam chags can 'jus pa yo byad rnams kun/
190b2(mdo sde): tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/ kar sha pa Na dag sba nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/ khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni yi dgas su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi
190b3(mdo sde): nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro// bu de la'ang slu bar byed de bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du/ dge slong 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro// phyis re zhig na de shi ba dang / de yi
190b4(mdo sde): dgas su skyes nas/ bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de/ sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa
190b5(mdo sde): dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brten pa rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
190b6(mdo sde): bar 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
190b7(mdo sde): gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil
191a1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i srub bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags/
191a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ des chu klung gang+gA'i 'gram
191a3(mdo sde): du lo ma'i spyil pa byas te bsam gtan byed do// de'i ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de'ang sdong drum me reg ma 'dra la/ gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa'i lto na ri
191a4(mdo sde): tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa chu smad
191a5(mdo sde): kyi thad du song nas/ re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/ 'dri kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig gang las bcas pa yi/
191a6(mdo sde): byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te// zas dang skom dang bral ba yi// yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes// bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te// chu yi bag kyang ma mthong /
191a7(mdo sde): na// kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong // 'bras bu ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi// drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur// gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang // de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur// btsun/
191b1(mdo sde): pa'i shing drung bde ba lags// khyod kyi sdod nang chu yang bsil// bkres pa bdag la thugs rje skyed// skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig/ de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa
191b2(mdo sde): yum khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang
191b3(mdo sde): ma byin/ bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so// bu gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa
191b4(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/ 'on tang bdag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do// chu smad kyis smras pa/ de ltar bgyis khyod
191b5(mdo sde): kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug cig/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo che ste ngo mi thub bo// chu smad kyis smras pa/ yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa
191b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na/ da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo tsha/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ 'o na de bzhin 'ong bar bya'o// de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas
191b7(mdo sde): phyid nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/ gdugs tshod la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/ yi dgas
192a1(mdo sde): mo de'ang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis yi dgas mo de mthong ngo // de dag gis yi dgas mo de'i lus mi sdug pa
192a2(mdo sde): mthong nas/ shin tu skyo ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos
192a3(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas/ yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod
192a4(mdo sde): nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las// de ni myur du thar gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten
192a5(mdo sde): nas yi dgas mo de dang / skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// yi dgas mo de'ang sems dga'
192a6(mdo sde): bapar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so// tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes par shes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/
192a7(mdo sde): yum 'di ma mthun yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dag gyis shig/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ bu gcig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so// de nas tshe dang
192b1(mdo sde): ldan pa chu smad kyis/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/ chags pa'i mun pa'i mig ni rab bsgribs te// khyod kyis yi dgas 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi// khyod kyi rus bu chen po
192b2(mdo sde): sha med pa// rus pa pags pa spyi rnams da dung 'dug/ ces byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis lan mang du smyos te smras nas/ de'i tshe 'og tu de las ras zung gcig thob bo//
192b3(mdo sde): de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/ gang gis dge 'dun la ras zung gcig po nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi gdang la bzhag go// de nas yi dgas mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus
192b4(mdo sde): so// de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/ chu smad song ste yi dgas mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no// de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/
192b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang / dge slong des kyang de gshags nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to// de nas de phyin chad ma brkus so//
192b6(mdo sde): de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser sna mtho 'tshams par byed pa mthong nas/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna spang
192b7(mdo sde): kha la brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
193a1(mdo sde): la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dmus long zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
193a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang //
193a3(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
193a4(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
193a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
193a6(mdo sde): pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
193a7(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang
193b1(mdo sde): chos gos bzhag/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus long du 'dug pa/ rang gi sgras yog pa/ lho ni/
193b2(mdo sde): ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang / de gnad la
193b3(mdo sde): bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan
193b4(mdo sde): pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/ sring mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas nas/ nges 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/
193b5(mdo sde): nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig
193b6(mdo sde): pa spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams
193b7(mdo sde): la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston to// 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das la chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed
194a1(mdo sde): do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsum/ chur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzub pa yin te/
194a2(mdo sde): der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' byed tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gzod ga las 'ongasadaga' byed
194a3(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas rgyu bo'i nang nas mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/ dmus long du mchis pa/ rang gi sgras yog pa
194a4(mdo sde): lho ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/ dur khrod bzhin du dring ba/ khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor nas/ phyogs kun nas sha bkum zhi bkum zhing 'tshal ba
194a5(mdo sde): dang / de gnang la bab ste/ dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong
194a6(mdo sde): lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la// mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug/ rang gi sgras ni gdong yog gcer bur mchis// mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra/
194a7(mdo sde): rab tu rid// de ltar gcer bu smras yog pa// rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin// thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la// ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid// bkres pa dang ni skom pa
194b1(mdo sde): yis/ 'dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen// nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/ rab 'jigs sdig pagyi
194b2(mdo sde): bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' byed yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no//
194b3(mdo sde): de'i las kyi rnam pa nyam par 'dod dam/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dga' byed sngon byung ba
194b4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
194b5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig
194b6(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas grong khyer wA rA tA si de na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/
194b7(mdo sde): des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yod tan du blta bar gyur te/ des pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
195a1(mdo sde): de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las/ re zhig na des
195a2(mdo sde): bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i gzhi la lhod par byas so// de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do// de nas des sbyin bdag khyims bdag rnams dang
195a3(mdo sde): pas nges par 'bul ba'ang gcod du bcug/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa'ang brjod/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong //
195a4(mdo sde): na'ang mig btsums te 'dug go/ dga' byed ji snyam du sems tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/ des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni yi dgas
195a5(mdo sde): su skyes so// des nar ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang / bya rgod dang / khyi dang / wa rnams kyis bskor to// de slob pa mi slob pa dge slong rnams bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas na de'i
195a6(mdo sde): lus dri nga bar gyur to// dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/ mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to// dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
195a7(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
195b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
195b2(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to//
195b3(mdo sde): der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang
195b4(mdo sde): ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang /
195b5(mdo sde): lha dang / lha mo yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
195b6(mdo sde): do// // tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi
195b7(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am
196a1(mdo sde): / ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
196a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
196a3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
196a4(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
196a5(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de phyi zhig nga rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
196a6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro
196a7(mdo sde): ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
196b1(mdo sde): kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
196b2(mdo sde): tu byung nas/ kun la grags pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsas dang / sman bzod rnams rnyed par gyur to//
196b3(mdo sde): des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed de cog sogs par byed de/ des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so// de nas ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas
196b4(mdo sde): pa des na/ rang gi yo byad lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dgas su skyes so// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN+DI mjug med pa brdungs nas
196b5(mdo sde): rus bu phyir phyung ngo // de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/ phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so// de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste chos gos dang / lhung bzed g.yar snga 'drim pa la
196b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa dang / re zhig na yi dgas rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la/ lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos dang / lhung bzed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo // de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/
196b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams skye ba bskyed pa dang /
197a1(mdo sde): ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis nam ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/ gnas
197a2(mdo sde): der gshegs so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa//
197a3(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga'
197a4(mdo sde): pa skyes te/ de ngo che bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang / rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dgas de spyos te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag
197a5(mdo sde): nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/ des ni yi dgas su skyes pa yin gyis/ da yang ngal sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la'ang sems ma chags par byas dang
197a6(mdo sde): legs so// 'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye te/ de nas yi dgas des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dur la phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
197a7(mdo sde): nyes pa bshags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/ sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang // de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig
197b1(mdo sde): rten rab 'jigs las// de ni byung du zar gyur cig/ de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dgas rdzu 'brus/
197b2(mdo sde): chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs
197b3(mdo sde): pas byugs pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa kho ra
197b4(mdo sde): khor yug 'od chen pos sdang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
197b5(mdo sde): de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa skur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang
197b6(mdo sde): ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i
197b7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po 'am
198a1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ yi dgas de shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te / de mdang sum
198a2(mdo sde): nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dgas su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar/
198a3(mdo sde): ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang
198a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
198a5(mdo sde): bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
198a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
198a7(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
198b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
198b2(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tsha la bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
198b3(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo // rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/ zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ chos gos dang lhung
198b4(mdo sde): bzed bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba dang / des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nyen kor du yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gis bshos po/ dur khrod na 'dug bzhin
198b5(mdo sde): keng rus kyis bskor ba/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/ bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas
198b6(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa/ khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/ des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ yi dgas mos smras pa/ nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis//
198b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang / de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/ de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang
199a1(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la spang bu'i
199a2(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi ma skol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma'ang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do// de nas
199a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/ snyan par gsung ba/ tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
199a4(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa
199a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/ der bdag gis yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/ lus khrag gis bshos pa/ dur khrod na 'dug pa
199a6(mdo sde): bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'// mtshan yang de bzhin lnga bca' ste// btsas nas de dag zos na yang //
199a7(mdo sde): 'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchin// de yis mi yi 'jig rten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na// des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// 'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur// bcom ldan
199b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no// de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags sa
199b2(mdo sde): 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA rA NA si na tshong dpon phyug cing nor
199b3(mdo sde): mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
199b4(mdo sde): nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/ bdag gi
199b5(mdo sde): khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ sems khongs su
199b6(mdo sde): chud cing 'dug go// de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang gsol ba
199b7(mdo sde): 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags chel gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang
200a1(mdo sde): chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyu bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyuraro
200a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong
200a3(mdo sde): stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la
200a4(mdo sde): bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu'ang ma byung // bu mo'ang ma byung nas//
200a5(mdo sde): de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/ ma la bdag gis chung ma zhig blangs na/ brgya la bu yod par 'gyur lha srid dam snyam ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cingag/
200a6(mdo sde): rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo
200a7(mdo sde): bdag la sras chags te/ bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/ khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de'ang dga' ches te/
200b1(mdo sde): ro stod ni bteg/ lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag
200b2(mdo sde): gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig/ nor gyi skal ba la spyod par shog cig/ bdag gi rigs brgyud ring du gnas par shog cig/ bdag cag 'das te
200b3(mdo sde): shi ba'i 'og tu 'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung / nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas de nyis gang dang gang du skyes zhing 'gro ba der 'di song zhig ces
200b4(mdo sde): sngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i ye/
200b5(mdo sde): byad rnams dang / tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yod byed rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang / ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang sgyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan
200b6(mdo sde): che che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang / kha ba dang / skur ba dang / lan tshwa
200b7(mdo sde): dang / dngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du
201a1(mdo sde): khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci'ang mi thos par byas so//
201a2(mdo sde): de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsam pa/ gal te 'di las bu btsas par gyur na ni/ bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis ci
201a3(mdo sde): nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos so snyam mo// 'dod pa la yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci'ang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha bltas pa// des yi/
201a4(mdo sde): rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no// de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma
201a5(mdo sde): de zhal lce la bkug ste/ khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug pas mngal drug pa'i rtsi byin te/ des bdag gi bu 'phel to zhes byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna'
201a6(mdo sde): khor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag yi dgas mor gyur te bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces byas so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems
201a7(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dgas mor skyes so// des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa
201b1(mdo sde): des ni nyin mo dang nub mo bu lnga lnga bca' zhing za bar gyur to// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung /
201b2(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang / skra dang
201b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
201b4(mdo sde): phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
201b5(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / sgra ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
201b6(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
201b7(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang
202a1(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na/ spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten
202a2(mdo sde): cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na/ yi dgas zas su skyug pa za ba/ bor ba za ba/ ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tshe ba/
202a3(mdo sde): rnag dang / khrag dang / phyis za ba dang / mi bzad pa/ rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnas so// yang smras pa/ skyug pa za zhing bor ba za// ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho
202a4(mdo sde): ba dang // rnag khrag dang ni phyis za// mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/ yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de//
202a5(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to// de nas bram ze
202a6(mdo sde): des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni lho na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthus yin no zhes zer ro// re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u
202a7(mdo sde): mdog ngan cing blta na mi sdug la byad ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig bcas so// de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi// byams pa'i dbang gis 'brel pa sa pha ma
202b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis gsos so// de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la/ phyag dar gyi phung po dang / phyi sa khung du skra 'bal zhing khwar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas/ de'i ming byis/
202b2(mdo sde): khung zhes bya bar gyur to// re zhig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srungs rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las 'di ni
202b3(mdo sde): gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la/ legs pa byed pa la'ang
202b4(mdo sde): gnas so// de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi
202b5(mdo sde): 'o bas de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de/ dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to// phyis re zhig na khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo //
202b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas yi dgas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byang
202b7(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong
203a1(mdo sde): ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cis 'phongs yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa
203a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/ des yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag tshim
203a3(mdo sde): par mdzad do// de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma
203a4(mdo sde): lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang / sum
203a5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
203a6(mdo sde): bdag cag zhag lon te/ gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo//
203a7(mdo sde): de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can// lus gur kum dang /
203b1(mdo sde): ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku pu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub
203b2(mdo sde): bkang ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od cheran pos sdang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//
203b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
203b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa de thos nas/ lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste
203b5(mdo sde): de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis
203b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas khye'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa
203b7(mdo sde): dang / yi dgas de dag ma mthong ngo // de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi
204a1(mdo sde): mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/
204a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa ga rig
204a3(mdo sde): pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi
204a4(mdo sde): mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs
204a5(mdo sde): pa yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug
204a6(mdo sde): la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs
204a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum ma chen gsum
204b1(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dang / su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam/
204b2(mdo sde): nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni
204b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
204b4(mdo sde): rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa
204b5(mdo sde): 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//
204b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga dro sha ma thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs
204b7(mdo sde): kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te srang du gshegs na/
205a1(mdo sde): phyi sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
205a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
205a3(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so// de dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
205a4(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu'ang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par gyur na bdag kyang
205a5(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen pas/ de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par
205a6(mdo sde): thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
205a7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas/ zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon po lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/
205b1(mdo sde): lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas
205b2(mdo sde): kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
205b3(mdo sde): pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
205b4(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
205b5(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
205b6(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang
205b7(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gul par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na'ang ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan
206a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi
206a2(mdo sde): mchog yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan phyis khung gis las ci bgyis na
206a3(mdo sde): des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
206a4(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
206a5(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
206a6(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par
206a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag
206b1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
206b2(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen po/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor
206b3(mdo sde): kha 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba den brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang zhig
206b4(mdo sde): brtsigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ongs pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/
206b5(mdo sde): de'ang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa rnams mthong na/ tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par
206b6(mdo sde): byed do// dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing snga bar byed do// phyis re zhig na gzhag gi yul nas
206b7(mdo sde): dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de'ang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/ des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so// de nas dga' ba skyes te
207a1(mdo sde): phyir nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so// dge slong gzhi pa de ni de na med pa las re zhig na phyid nyin cho ga dang /
207a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/ ba shos kyang bar shams pa dang / dge slong gzhi pa de'ang 'ongs te/ de'ang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed rengs su byung ste/
207a3(mdo sde): dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de phrag dog skyes nas des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyod ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang
207a4(mdo sde): bla'i/ sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/
207a5(mdo sde): cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so// re zhig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa dge slong gzhi pa des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so// thos nas kyang de 'gyod
207a6(mdo sde): pa skyes so// de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des de
207a7(mdo sde): dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ des de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad
207b1(mdo sde): kyis sbyangs so// 'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so// de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems/
207b2(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gis bklags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa
207b3(mdo sde): chen po dag byin pa dang / dge 'dun la bskyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig
207b4(mdo sde): ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las
207b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/ de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe'ang 'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba
207b6(mdo sde): gyur la/ mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to// de nas kha ton byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel
207b7(mdo sde): par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid
208a1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyis khung so so'i skye bor
208a2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshegs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
208a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la
208a4(mdo sde): sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa
208a5(mdo sde): rdzogs so// // sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang // sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma// gos dang ne tso pho nya dang // ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang // ngang pa tha mar brjod pa
208a6(mdo sde): yin/ sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
208a7(mdo sde): dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
208b1(mdo sde): skyo 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur gyi byas/ tha mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / sto /
208b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman
208b3(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim
208b4(mdo sde): bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/ de'ang ser sna can
208b5(mdo sde): 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa khwa la'ang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed
208b6(mdo sde): ro// de nas des rang gi skyed po'i tshul du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po swa te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa
208b7(mdo sde): sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig tu skyes so// de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog
209a1(mdo sde): thag tu'ang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad rlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to// skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying ngo //
209a2(mdo sde): la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal
209a3(mdo sde): po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
209a4(mdo sde): 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par
209a5(mdo sde): gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par
209a6(mdo sde): dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ska nga sa la btsus
209a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na
209b1(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po chag par bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol// de nas/
209b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas
209b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las langs nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
209b4(mdo sde): gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste
209b5(mdo sde): de dag gis skyed mos che la de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag
209b6(mdo sde): shu rab tu sim par gyur to// de nas sbrul gdug po des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur cig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
209b7(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyad pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
210a1(mdo sde): ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/
210a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyis kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par ltung bar byas so// de'ang nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed
210a3(mdo sde): la gter 'di la'ang sems ma chags par byas dang legs so// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skye sa re/ de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa
210a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa lo// da ni nga yis ci byar med// mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med dus
210a5(mdo sde): pas ci la phan// 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// ngal dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub
210a6(mdo sde): de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du bsnams so// 'di'i skabs su rgyal po dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so//
210a7(mdo sde): de nas sbrul gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo
210b1(mdo sde): skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'bos/ gang du skyes pa las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa
210b2(mdo sde): dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sgra yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i sgro'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
210b3(mdo sde): zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sprul
210b4(mdo sde): gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus dro shal dang se mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis sbas pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / tam
210b5(mdo sde): la'i lo ma dang / smrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dra dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/
210b6(mdo sde): 'od mo'i tsha la bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
210b7(mdo sde): go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
211a1(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
211a2(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams
211a3(mdo sde): pa dang / rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
211a4(mdo sde): bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams/
211a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad//
211a6(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thog
211a7(mdo sde): bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skyes dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa
211b1(mdo sde): stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bsor/
211b2(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo
211b3(mdo sde): g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs
211b4(mdo sde): can snying po'i thad du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po longs/ nyal te ci bya/ de nas rgyal
211b5(mdo sde): bo gnyid sad de 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so// de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug
211b6(mdo sde): btul te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la'ang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// de bdag gi
211b7(mdo sde): khyod la bstan gyis/ khyod song la/ skyed mos che la de'i phyogs go ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/
212a1(mdo sde): yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so// de nas sngon sbru la gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i
212a2(mdo sde): bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul
