212a3(mdo sde): mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
212a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dge bgyis na des sbrul gdug par skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar
212a5(mdo sde): gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i
212a6(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/
212a7(mdo sde): skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa
212b1(mdo sde): de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi gyur pa dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs car snying po bcog
212b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de
212b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
212b4(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang
212b5(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
212b6(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
212b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
213a1(mdo sde): bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul khyim bdag mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so// de'i tshe ba tan du yod pa/
213a2(mdo sde): na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags
213a3(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so// de'ang bram ze des dka'
213a4(mdo sde): bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas/ de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas/ de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i
213a5(mdo sde): ming zla ba zhes btags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de/ bskor bas bram ze de'ang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/ 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang /
213a6(mdo sde): nyal ba dag gi tshe'ang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/ bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med
213a7(mdo sde): zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ de'ang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
213b1(mdo sde): lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis
213b2(mdo sde): skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas sngon
213b3(mdo sde): bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
213b4(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan
213b5(mdo sde): n+dan lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra pa rnam
213b6(mdo sde): kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar
213b7(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden po bzhi
214a1(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/
214a2(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ba skams pa
214a3(mdo sde): dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma
214a4(mdo sde): bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon mchun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong
214a5(mdo sde): dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro
214a6(mdo sde): pa phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags/
214a7(mdo sde): pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//
214b1(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgu' 'gyur te// bcud rtsi b.rabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // sgra yi 'jig rtem bltas su yul song // de nas sngon bram zer/
214b2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshang pa la spogs phyin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bos g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nang thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
214b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gis gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyam par brtson bcur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du sdang ba chen pa
214b4(mdo sde): byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsam skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya
214b5(mdo sde): byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i
214b6(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/ de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
214b7(mdo sde): bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug
215a1(mdo sde): cing 'phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang bar bzhag ste/ kyi hung bu/ kyi hung bu thu go
215a2(mdo sde): kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer zhing 'bod de/ de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar gcugs kyang slang ma nus nas/ de khwa dang / chu na lag dang / bya rgod dang / wa rnams kyis ni bskor/ bud med sla ba shig
215a3(mdo sde): pab dag dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go// de nas de'i bur lhar skyes pas/ pa smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes snying bskyed de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir
215a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des/ drang srong de la dris pa/ kye drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig/
215a5(mdo sde): sgrub drang srong gis smras pa/ de ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba
215a6(mdo sde): bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/ shing rta de la nganon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do// bram zes smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun du dka' thub spyad byas te// dka' thub
215a7(mdo sde): mchog gis spyad byas kyang // gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob// drang srong gis smras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu mnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub
215b1(mdo sde): bram zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo// drang srong gis smras pa/ gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar// rgyun du ngu ba'i las byas kyang // bu de khyod kyis re mi thog// khyod na/
215b2(mdo sde): dus kyang ci la phan// de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dang po skyes so// dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces byas so// de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/
215b3(mdo sde): rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste pha la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
215b4(mdo sde): skyes nas/ khyed kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang / khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid
215b5(mdo sde): do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
215b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram ze des 'jig
215b7(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// des mtho bar gyur pa thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
216a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
216a2(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
216a3(mdo sde): dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe'ang pha gsang ba las thug pa las
216a4(mdo sde): ldan gsum bskyabs byas te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na gzhan gyi chung ma la
216a5(mdo sde): byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go/ de nas re zhig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gang shod ma
216a6(mdo sde): rnams la gsod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas/ srog 'phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
216a7(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// dge slong rnams kyis gsol
216b1(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na nges pa dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
216b2(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs kyi ring la gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas ni phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na
216b3(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
216b4(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
216b5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // sA la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
216b6(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
216b7(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
217a1(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs/
217a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
217a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha la khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/
217a4(mdo sde): der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/ shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la me tog blangs te mnyan du yod
217a5(mdo sde): pa'i nang du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyi mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar
217a6(mdo sde): gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom
217a7(mdo sde): gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la sA la'i me tog
217b1(mdo sde): gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor bar byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang / re zhig na de sA la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las ltung ste/
217b2(mdo sde): shi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de nas re zhig na lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan te
217b3(mdo sde): lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du sang ngo // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug
217b4(mdo sde): pa las lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
217b5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur// 'dri na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma
217b6(mdo sde): rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos// sgra mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi// mi yi nyi mnyan
217b7(mdo sde): thos bcas// sA la'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag gis legs par gtor// las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad+ma zla bltar//
218a1(mdo sde): rnam dag 'od ldan pa lta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnams spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis/
218a2(mdo sde): sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan
218a3(mdo sde): mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas
218a4(mdo sde): shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar/
218a5(mdo sde): gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom
218a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang sa mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i
218a7(mdo sde): cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang
218b1(mdo sde): de nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
218b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos
218b3(mdo sde): nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rje mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum
218b4(mdo sde): brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i rna/
218b5(mdo sde): rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi
218b6(mdo sde): dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
218b7(mdo sde): song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig
219a1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//
219a2(mdo sde): skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal
219a3(mdo sde): nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha lhas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las
219a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar
219a5(mdo sde): brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
219a6(mdo sde): ci lags/ mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang kho brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
219a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis
219b1(mdo sde): gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de ni ngas sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi rtse/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas re/
219b2(mdo sde): la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par
219b3(mdo sde): bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
219b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam po bcu gsum pa/ dpa'
219b5(mdo sde): ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
219b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas
219b7(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
220a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
220a2(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs
220a3(mdo sde): can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang
220a4(mdo sde): 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/
220a5(mdo sde): bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dus
220a6(mdo sde): gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la/ ngang ba dang / khrung khrung dang /
220a7(mdo sde): rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong
220b1(mdo sde): nas/ der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs na/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir/
220b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar cig nang / 'on tang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me
220b3(mdo sde): tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la
220b4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo stsal du gsol/ 'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi
220b5(mdo sde): zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang srin mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen
220b6(mdo sde): po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsros nas de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang /
220b7(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis rbad de/ yab chos dang
221a1(mdo sde): ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad de/ su'ang /
221a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas so// de nas gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod
221a3(mdo sde): rten de la su phyag bdar byed pa'am/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog 'bul ba med do// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de des bur gyur pa'ang mthong / rgyal po
221a4(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po yang dran nas snying rje rje skad du dra zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so zhes 'dzer to// de'i nang nas btsun mo
221a5(mdo sde): dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag bdar byas te mar me'i 'phreng ba dang ra to// de nas re zhig
221a6(mdo sde): na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / re zhig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan pas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la
221a7(mdo sde): mar me'i 'phreng ba dang rab lags so zhes byas so// de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces rmas na/ de na re bdag gis khyod kyi bka' bcag tu lags kyang /
221b1(mdo sde): bdag gros chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag ga zhes zer ro// de ras de khrol nas 'khor 'phangs te bsad do// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba gyu/
221b2(mdo sde): te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// de'i tshe sgra'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'das nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma sgra'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba 'khor khor yug tu dpag
221b3(mdo sde): tshad gcig pa dang ldan pa de lha'i mdun ma'i nang du song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i
221b4(mdo sde): gser 'dra pad+ma ut+pal lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur
221b5(mdo sde): gyur// rnalas rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smos// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig pu// mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug
221b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mthong // spra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba dang // mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phul// zla ba'i 'od zer mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od// mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa byed
221b7(mdo sde): 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis// las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// mazhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar
222a1(mdo sde): rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug brgya byin gyis smras pa kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyis pa thams cad rnams spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod
222a2(mdo sde): kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/ bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa ni// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i
222a3(mdo sde): spyan mnga' ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po me lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang
222a4(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems
222a5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis
222a6(mdo sde): bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba de nyid kyi mtshan mo me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu
222a7(mdo sde): da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba ba ka nga ste/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka ga nas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis
222b1(mdo sde): gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin/
222b2(mdo sde): thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
222b3(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag
222b4(mdo sde): mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag
222b5(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
222b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras panyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod
222b7(mdo sde): kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thos// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las
223a1(mdo sde): brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang /
223a2(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal
223a3(mdo sde): nas// dragra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha lhas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang
223a4(mdo sde): dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni/
223a5(mdo sde): srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
223a6(mdo sde): la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du
223a7(mdo sde): mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir
223b1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra/
223b2(mdo sde): skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang
223b3(mdo sde): bor skyes nas/ de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge sbyong dag de bas na 'di lhur bslab par bya ste/ sngon
223b4(mdo sde): pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge
223b5(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
223b6(mdo sde): gos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
223b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
224a1(mdo sde): po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
224a2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang
224a3(mdo sde): gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'durwa dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
224a4(mdo sde): ba na bzhugs so// de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/ mthar gyis gser
224a5(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe/ de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis/ bdag
224a6(mdo sde): gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa sdud de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o//
224a7(mdo sde): de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la'ang phan btags par 'gyur la/ bsod nams mang po'ang skyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji lta
224b1(mdo sde): bsdams pa de rgyal po la gsos nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi byed rams nyon cig/ deng nas nag dun/
224b2(mdo sde): na khyim bdag mgon med zas spyir gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dang brdzud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su
224b3(mdo sde): gtang bar gyis shig ces sgo'o// de nas re zhig na zhag bdur lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa srung ba la
224b4(mdo sde): zhugs te/ der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do// kha cig ni mgul gyi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig
224b5(mdo sde): ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyar sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni
224b6(mdo sde): tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do// khyim bdag de'ang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do// de nas re zhig na bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gis sha thang sa/ zla ba gsum gyis
224b7(mdo sde): ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras de byon te/ srang du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum rdung bzhin du rkyang nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ des dge bsnyen zhig/
225a1(mdo sde): la dris pa/ ci ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar/
225a2(mdo sde): byed ces byas pa dang / dge bsnyen de na re/ gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs
225a3(mdo sde): par byed de/ ci nas mang por bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du gzhug go zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin bdag gcig pus bcom ldan
225a4(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ba shos gsol pa'i mthu bdag la med kyis bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras
225a5(mdo sde): yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci'ang ma mthong ste ga des bsams pa/ gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur byung gi bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam
225a6(mdo sde): mo// de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang thog nas bor ba las na 'di
225a7(mdo sde): la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas/ rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed ras 'di sus bor ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang / re zhig na bu mo de cog tseg pur 'dug
225b1(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis dris pa/ de na re bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa sa
225b2(mdo sde): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas
225b3(mdo sde): bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to// de nas de tshe zung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la'ang med pa
225b4(mdo sde): de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo // lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skyes par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes las gang
225b5(mdo sde): gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ras 'bul
225b6(mdo sde): 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus dor shal dang sen mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang /
225b7(mdo sde): ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spri ga ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu
226a1(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od cher pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//
226a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
226a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
226a4(mdo sde): bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /
226a5(mdo sde): ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/
226a6(mdo sde): rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma
226a7(mdo sde): bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i
226b1(mdo sde): lam yang bdag gis thob/ bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi
226b2(mdo sde): pa'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//
226b3(mdo sde): de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ras
226b4(mdo sde): 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe srogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang
226b5(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom
226b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi
226b7(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
227a1(mdo sde): dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i
227a2(mdo sde): bud med de/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de ma dang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/
227a3(mdo sde): ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la bkur
227a4(mdo sde): sti bya'o// bkur sti med par mi bya'o// dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
227a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang /
227a6(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams
227a7(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang
227b1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' rdzing dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa//
227b2(mdo sde): na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
227b3(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa
227b4(mdo sde): dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu
227b5(mdo sde): ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba grang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal
227b6(mdo sde): srid bskyangs so// rgyal po de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang / bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa
227b7(mdo sde): che ba skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas blon po rnams
228a1(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo //
228a2(mdo sde): ngani bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan
228a3(mdo sde): to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci'ang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
228a4(mdo sde): 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag
228a5(mdo sde): mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
228a6(mdo sde): bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthis shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun blo nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po
228a7(mdo sde): sgrogs pa/ yan lag rdza rnam par spangs pa/ 'phro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs ma/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba
228b1(mdo sde): drugs gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yanas ga bdun gyi me tog gis thug pa/ sam yan lag tun pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i goms par 'jug pa dbul gnas pa/ stobs btsun
228b2(mdo sde): spobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kum rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa pas kyang ches byeng par du 'phags pa rnams mchos nyid kyis nyi ngas gsum mchar dus gsus
228b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni chung/ su ni dang / su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam ngab
228b4(mdo sde): dang / gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par
228b5(mdo sde): bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i
228b6(mdo sde): ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs
228b7(mdo sde): pa 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/
229a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos thos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos/
229a2(mdo sde): gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las/ nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/ des bcom
229a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo // de nas shin tu rings par song ster/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das ga shegs pa legs
229a4(mdo sde): so legs so// bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir
229a5(mdo sde): shing gang la ne tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtsa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do// de nas ne tses bcom ldan 'das
229a6(mdo sde): dang nyan thos rnams la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun
229a7(mdo sde): skor bar byed do// de nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/
229b1(mdo sde): bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci'ang ma mchis na bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs
229b2(mdo sde): so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to//
229b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang bzangs kyi steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des/ rgyal po la smras pa/
229b4(mdo sde): kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas
229b5(mdo sde): so// de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas/ gdugs dang /
229b6(mdo sde): rgyal mchen dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur sti chen
229b7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so// de nas ni ci de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni
230a1(mdo sde): bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba/
230a2(mdo sde): las khras khyer te bsad do// bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa
230a3(mdo sde): ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
230a4(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas
230a5(mdo sde): gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha
230a6(mdo sde): gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod par can/ lus gur ku ma dang / ta ma la'i le ma dang
230a7(mdo sde): sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mchen mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal
230b1(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das/
230b2(mdo sde): sngon ne cor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsdam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhir thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
230b3(mdo sde): de thos nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/
230b4(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa
230b5(mdo sde): dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis//
230b6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
230b7(mdo sde): song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i
231a1(mdo sde): mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ mi mchog dbang po mi
231a2(mdo sde): dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud
231a3(mdo sde): cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong ba khe sgrogs phyin pa
231a4(mdo sde): dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de/
231a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo //
231a6(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig
231a7(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya
231b1(mdo sde): byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams
231b2(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa kwa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ni co de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no//
231b3(mdo sde): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ne tso skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur
231b4(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyeni grub pa dang ldan te/ dbang rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag
231b5(mdo sde): byas shing bsag pas na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnam
231b6(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing
231b7(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//
232a1(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i/
232a2(mdo sde): tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
232a3(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas
232a4(mdo sde): re zhig na de ni dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// des bslab pa'i gzhi
232a5(mdo sde): lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las
232a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las
232a7(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab
232b1(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
232b2(mdo sde): po nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / der
232b3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/
232b4(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyir dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
232b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
232b6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der
232b7(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog cig/ ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mjed du gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring
233a1(mdo sde): mo zhig tu ma mthong / bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so// de nas/
233a2(mdo sde): rgyal pos/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa
233a3(mdo sde): lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam pazhes so zhes thos lags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs
233a4(mdo sde): pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi dang / blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyas bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
233a5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol/ bdag cag gi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam
233a6(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi
233a7(mdo sde): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags
233b1(mdo sde): so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o// de dag/
233b2(mdo sde): mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar gyis song song
233b3(mdo sde): pa las/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas rgyal po'i khab tu grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
233b4(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / mnyan du yod pa na
233b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyong ba yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/
233b6(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan napa/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu ma
233b7(mdo sde): mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
234a1(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par gshegs gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar
234a2(mdo sde): bya'o// de nas po nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa
234a3(mdo sde): stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas
234a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla ga su ma bzlas nasachos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ zham ring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod
234a5(mdo sde): pa logs su chas te gshegs so// pho nya'ang shing rta la zhon te chas so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/ shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan
234a6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs brtse ba'i slang du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom
234a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang // yang dag col lang gnas nas// nyon mongs tsher rams ma snad par// sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras pa/ bcom
234b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags pa dang / thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags
234b2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas/ pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal po dang
234b3(mdo sde): blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshe la de nyid du 'khod do// pho nya de ni tshe thung ste
234b4(mdo sde): chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam
234b5(mdo sde): pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang
234b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro
234b7(mdo sde): ba ni cha ma yin gyisabadag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul ba thogs pa/ lus ngo
235a1(mdo sde): shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smrig ka la sogs pas byug sa
235a2(mdo sde): pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos
235a3(mdo sde): snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i
235a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstar te/ de thos nas sngon pho nyar
235a5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan
235a6(mdo sde): gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris
235a7(mdo sde): dang mthar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams
235b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so//
235b2(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthus yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan ma tho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
235b3(mdo sde): gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'bang
235b4(mdo sde): thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas ngo
235b5(mdo sde): shAl 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// 'dud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lnga yul song // de nas sngon po nyar gyur
235b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa 'i spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan
235b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam
236a1(mdo sde): nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig
236a2(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang
236a3(mdo sde): po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/ shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
236a4(mdo sde): skyes nas/ de madrang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ kye ma sangs
236a5(mdo sde): rgyas kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun 'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis
236a6(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis/
236a7(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags
236b1(mdo sde): pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o// sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam pa rkang bzhi rnams sam//
236b2(mdo sde): rkang mangs rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes
236b3(mdo sde): yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par
236b4(mdo sde): bstan to// sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi
236b5(mdo sde): nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//
236b6(mdo sde): chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to// /
236b7(mdo sde): chos la mngon par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa
237a1(mdo sde): rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun
237a2(mdo sde): mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ tshogs sam/ 'dus pa 'am/ mang po 'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la
237a3(mdo sde): mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngor par dga' ba su'ang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa'ang lha rnam
237a4(mdo sde): kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// bcom
237a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de gdu rjes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas mngon par bstod do// bam po bcu bzhis
237a6(mdo sde): ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon
237a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
237b1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang //
237b2(mdo sde): lto'i phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
237b3(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pe ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma he khyu chen po dang /
237b4(mdo sde): ma he'i rdzing lnga brgya 'khod do// de nas re zhig na de'i nang na mahe skyongs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do// bcom ldan
237b5(mdo sde): 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas ma he'i rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis skad chen por bos te/ bcom
237b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gshegs gsol zhes byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis khyed snying ma chung
237b7(mdo sde): zhig/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang / rnga ma ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge
238a1(mdo sde): ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sbrul de gro g.yas g.yon du me cher po lnga sprul to// steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to// de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs/
238a2(mdo sde): pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas/ zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so// de nas bcom
238a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi de la des brda phrad pa'i skad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan
238a4(mdo sde): na sache rabs kyang dran par mjed de de thos nas ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// da ni nga yis ci byar yod// /
238a5(mdo sde): mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med ngus pas ci la phan// 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tung mtho ris
238a6(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la smad de/ kha 'chos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum cu
238a7(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/
238b1(mdo sde): las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong /
238b2(mdo sde): ngo // de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag zhag ma lon
238b3(mdo sde): par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu
238b4(mdo sde): rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang
238b5(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis
238b6(mdo sde): gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / ba ga la nyal dang / khams dang
238b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse ma
239a1(mdo sde): mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom
239a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /
239a3(mdo sde): bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen
239a4(mdo sde): gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ ston gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i
239a5(mdo sde): ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa
239a6(mdo sde): spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang
239a7(mdo sde): lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/
239b1(mdo sde): btsud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // sgra yi 'jig rtem pa bltas sgra yul song // de nas sngon ma her gyur lha'i bu de tshong pa'i sgom
239b2(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i
239b3(mdo sde): 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa
239b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ma dang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ lha'i 'od kyi snang bar bgyid pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyi ma he de
239b5(mdo sde): nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de ma dang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong
239b6(mdo sde): bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ma ho rje de dag gis mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom
239b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na/ bdag cag gos ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyu ro snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
240a1(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang //
240a2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod
240a3(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las grang dag bgyis na des maher skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du
240a4(mdo sde): skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis na rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
240a5(mdo sde): du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin
240a6(mdo sde): du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur
240a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
240b1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// sus
240b2(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
240b3(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
240b4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba
