240b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum
240b6(mdo sde): pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go// de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de sde snod gsum pA la 'dri bar byed la/ des ni lanam
240b7(mdo sde): thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so// de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes
241a1(mdo sde): smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge sbyong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no// slob/
241a2(mdo sde): ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so// slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to// ngal sems dga' bar gyur pa des ni lhar skyes so//
241a3(mdo sde): dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de bus nangag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya
241a4(mdo sde): ste/ ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
241a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bsnyen gnas
241a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang /
241a7(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po
241b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i rdzing dang / mi 'am ci dang
241b2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos
241b3(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshe la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
241b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de chos nyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen
241b5(mdo sde): gnas g.yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu
241b6(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
241b7(mdo sde): rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
242a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho
242a2(mdo sde): bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
242a3(mdo sde): bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon
242a4(mdo sde): gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi
242a5(mdo sde): mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la
242a6(mdo sde): brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad
242a7(mdo sde): spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//
242b1(mdo sde): dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo
242b2(mdo sde): g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i tshe
242b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/
242b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
242b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/
242b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden/
242b7(mdo sde): pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu
243a1(mdo sde): bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa
243a2(mdo sde): btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
243a3(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
243a4(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rteni byung ste/ de grong khyer
243a5(mdo sde): wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// phyis re zhig na rgyal po kri kri bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo // de nas re zhig na
243a6(mdo sde): bram ze gnyis drang srong smra ba'i don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu stobs chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo // de nas de
243a7(mdo sde): gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes/ de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/ de las ci bsags pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad
243b1(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang / ci 'dod pa de/
243b2(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so// de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so// de na gcig gis ni
243b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bur skyes te/ de'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go / cig bshos kyis
243b4(mdo sde): ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te/ de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye chen ba ba ste/ des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do//
243b5(mdo sde): de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam
243b6(mdo sde): mo// de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/ gang
243b7(mdo sde): gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o//
244a1(mdo sde): 'on tang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin
244a2(mdo sde): nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/ sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis/ lha bsnyen
244a3(mdo sde): gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol/ gal te ma ba tsa la na gdon mi 'chel bar lha'i dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//
244a4(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas/ gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gis yul thams cad du dril bsgrags
244a5(mdo sde): nasasu nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no// bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas re zhig na shing mkhan
244a6(mdo sde): gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na 'di phyung ste/
244a7(mdo sde): gzigs shig ces byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung zhig ces bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po'i zham ring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i 'og nas
244b1(mdo sde): bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam zhig la bris pa
244b2(mdo sde): zhig rnyed do// de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin no// drang srong smra ba gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang
244b3(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so// klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la byung ste/ lus bor nas de kho 'chos te 'dug go/
244b4(mdo sde): de nas shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de nas byung ste/ ming yang de las btags so//
244b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi ra sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / ngang pa zhes bya ba
244b6(mdo sde): ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpor rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
244b7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar
245a1(mdo sde): byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis//
245a2(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
245a3(mdo sde): brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod
245a4(mdo sde): pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /
245a5(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nang rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing cher/
245a6(mdo sde): ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// phyir re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal po rgyal byed kyi
245a7(mdo sde): chel du song ba dang / bany+tsa la'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo//
245b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel de nyid du btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos
245b2(mdo sde): gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la byos ma byin te/ de dag gis zos nas
245b3(mdo sde): tshim zhing dbang po rtas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong /
245b4(mdo sde): ste chos nyan par byed do// de nas de dag tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa
245b5(mdo sde): gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
245b6(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom
245b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ngang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu na/
246a1(mdo sde): cha gdub dkor dag cing mgul pa thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur kum dang
246a2(mdo sde): ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang
246a3(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas
246a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
246a5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
246a6(mdo sde): bu tho ba ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i
246a7(mdo sde): la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma
246b1(mdo sde): bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge
246b2(mdo sde): sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris
246b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob// bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob// bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brkus/
246b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng /
246b5(mdo sde): mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha
246b6(mdo sde): yul song // de nas sngon ngang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
246b7(mdo sde): thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/
247a1(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lam/
247a2(mdo sde): mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
247a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no// dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
247a4(mdo sde): gyis ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ de dag ngal sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
247a5(mdo sde): skyes te/ de dag mdang sum pa'i thang du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad
247a6(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des ngang par skyes pa lags/ las gang dag bgyis na/
247a7(mdo sde): des lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
247b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
247b2(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
247b3(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam
247b4(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskul ba brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
247b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
247b6(mdo sde): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od
247b7(mdo sde): srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong sme ba ri dgas kyi nags ni brten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas
248a1(mdo sde): pa des nA ngang par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to//
248a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
248a3(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
248a4(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
248a5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las
248a6(mdo sde): sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// / sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang / byad bzangs stobs ldan sdug dgu dang / pad+ma mig dang / sgra dang /
248a7(mdo sde): bu dang nyi ma kyang pa dang // gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
248b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am/
248b2(mdo sde): ci rnams dang / skyo 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
248b3(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha
248b4(mdo sde): dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i
248b5(mdo sde): tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas
248b6(mdo sde): pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla
248b7(mdo sde): kha brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba
249a1(mdo sde): zhig bcas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis gror khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang / sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la
249a2(mdo sde): lhags te/ sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs shig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mcher du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so// de na de bcas pa'i bcos ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad
249a3(mdo sde): gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di bcas pa na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis spang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces
249a4(mdo sde): gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u gser 'od bang ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / num bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la
249a5(mdo sde): gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du
249a6(mdo sde): skye drag par gyur to// de'ang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba
249a7(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa zhig go// phyis re zhig na de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go// shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo //
249b1(mdo sde): de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa/ khyed gar 'dod / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o// de nas
249b2(mdo sde): khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sgron ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag
249b3(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas/ de'ang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu
249b4(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
249b5(mdo sde): bo che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i
249b6(mdo sde): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ de chos thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol
249b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
250a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos
250a2(mdo sde): po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna lhar 'dug pa brkyang nas//
250a3(mdo sde): khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu tshur shog/ tshangs par spyod cig/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa
250a4(mdo sde): tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyuraro/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas
250a5(mdo sde): tshur shog bka' stsal pas// de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan
250a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
250a7(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams
250b1(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag
250b2(mdo sde): mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag
250b3(mdo sde): par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i
250b4(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na
250b5(mdo sde): des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
250b6(mdo sde): dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas
250b7(mdo sde): na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
251a1(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing /
251a2(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud
251a3(mdo sde): mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de
251a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/
251a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las/
251a6(mdo sde): re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
251a7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten
251b1(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btong ngo // de nas re zhig mkhyim bdag cig mchod/
251b2(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las/ mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la btags te/ spos dang /
251b3(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed
251b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu
251b5(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byed gzugs
251b6(mdo sde): khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam
251b7(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma
252a1(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la
252a2(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
252a3(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po
252a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang /
252a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byasari mor byas
252a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
252a7(mdo sde): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
252b1(mdo sde): ba yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser+ya m+b+ha'i gnas mkhyim bdag phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang /
252b2(mdo sde): shing rgya che brnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
252b3(mdo sde): spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog
252b4(mdo sde): los ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni can dan gyi dri byung ngo // de nas de'i bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas khye'u
252b5(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri
252b6(mdo sde): zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u dri zhim pa nga na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te
252b7(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
253a1(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang sngon gyi rgyu stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la
253a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim dpung brgyan dang / mgul pa'i do shal dang / gdu bus brgyan te/ srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe
253a3(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi dri ba sung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu
253a4(mdo sde): zhes 'dzer to// phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
253a5(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba/
253a6(mdo sde): mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir
253a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
253b1(mdo sde): bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
253b2(mdo sde): bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'brad pas phol mig smra pa'i
253b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par
253b4(mdo sde): rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser
253b5(mdo sde): dang bong mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ cen dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
253b6(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
253b7(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
254a1(mdo sde): dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i kha nas ni ut+pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni can dan gyi dri 'byung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan/
254a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag
254a3(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
254a4(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnam
254a5(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//
254a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
254a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
254b1(mdo sde): 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na ten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi//
254b2(mdo sde): 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis / bcom
254b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi lngas byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag cad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig bamyigs
254b4(mdo sde): temachod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do// khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod
254b5(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig
254b6(mdo sde): ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
254b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus mkhyim pa rag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bu
255a1(mdo sde): dri zhim par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam/
255a2(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par ga nag par 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig
255a3(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig
255a4(mdo sde): la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
255a5(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// bam po bco lnga pa// / byad bzangs zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon
255a6(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang
255a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byasamachod pa byas te/ lha dang
255b1(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyir dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang /
255b2(mdo sde): ldan pa / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing
255b3(mdo sde): n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi
255b4(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas po des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dgu' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing
255b5(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las
255b6(mdo sde): ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byangad dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhig bces so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas khye'u
255b7(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i lus dpe med pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byang bzangs zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u byang
256a1(mdo sde): bzangs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ru ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas
256a2(mdo sde): de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye
256a3(mdo sde): drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten
256a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar
256a5(mdo sde): bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar grags so// phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
256a6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba
256a7(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos
256b1(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags//
256b2(mdo sde): pa'i bden po bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba di lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u byang bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs la sba ba'i ri'i rtse mo mamang po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun byangaH/
256b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phal mig
256b4(mdo sde): lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
256b5(mdo sde): par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur na sa gser dang bong bar
256b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa / rig pa dang / mngon par
256b7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba ka dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa
257a1(mdo sde): dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
257a2(mdo sde): byang bzangs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzangs
257a3(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na byang bzangs
257a4(mdo sde): nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
257a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang
257a6(mdo sde): khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/
257a7(mdo sde): 'bras su nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
257b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa//
257b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
257b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
257b4(mdo sde): ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
257b5(mdo sde): gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshegs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring ring byas pas/ mchod
257b6(mdo sde): gyi dus ston byas so// phyis re zhig na nyi ma cig gcig mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas der me tog rnying pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo //
257b7(mdo sde): de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/ me tog rnying pa'ang bsal to// de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa
258a1(mdo sde): mthong nas dga' ba skyes te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pakra/ dge ba'i za ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag
258a2(mdo sde): thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du
258a3(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang bzangs 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag bdar byas pas na/ byang gzugs bzang por gyur to// smon lam btang
258a4(mdo sde): pa des tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gdag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las
258a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na
258a6(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par
258a7(mdo sde): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / stobs ldan zhes bya
258b1(mdo sde): bdi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon pa chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
258b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams
258b3(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
258b4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang /
258b5(mdo sde): srur gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes panyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i
258b6(mdo sde): gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des
258b7(mdo sde): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las / chung ma la bu chags nas
259a1(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig bces so//
259a2(mdo sde): de nas de bces ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u
259a3(mdo sde): 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u stobs ldan phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i mA ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
259a4(mdo sde): rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang /
259a5(mdo sde): cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
259a6(mdo sde): pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kur dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spu skyes bu chen po'i
259a7(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin
259b1(mdo sde): che'i ri bo 'gro ba la bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
259b2(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsom pa dang / bag la nyol dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud
259b3(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
259b4(mdo sde): bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang
259b5(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brten par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang
259b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par byang chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
259b7(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dri ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
260a1(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi
260a2(mdo sde): lta ba dang / dbang po dang nyi dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad
260a3(mdo sde): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
260a4(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis sngo tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la//
260a5(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ las byas
260a6(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge/
260a7(mdo sde): ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ lus can dag gi las rnams ni/
260b1(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa
260b2(mdo sde): gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
260b3(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs
260b4(mdo sde): pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
260b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi
260b6(mdo sde): las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu nga
260b7(mdo sde): gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to// phyis re zhig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo //
261a1(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi lde gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di/
261a2(mdo sde): lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
261a3(mdo sde): dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des
261a4(mdo sde): na/ stobs dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin//
261a5(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
261a6(mdo sde): smin pa'ang 'dren par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag re bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig/
261a7(mdo sde): la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
261b1(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do// sdug gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
261b2(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams/
261b3(mdo sde): dang mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
261b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
261b5(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
261b6(mdo sde): so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi
261b7(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa
262a1(mdo sde): las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung skye/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa mthong na dga' ba
262a2(mdo sde): zhig bcas te/ de bcas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes
262a3(mdo sde): ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di bcas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ khye'u 'di'i ming sdug gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u sdug
262a4(mdo sde): gu pa ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis
262a5(mdo sde): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mer gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skyes drag par gyur to//
262a6(mdo sde): de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa
262a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams la sbyin/
262b1(mdo sde): pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do// de nas phyis re zhig ma khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya grong d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po/
262b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che
262b3(mdo sde): ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
262b4(mdo sde): te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas//
262b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas
262b6(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
262b7(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'bor ba dang / rnam
263a1(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum
263a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsim par gyur pa/
263a3(mdo sde): rig pas sgo nga'i srubs bcom nas/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba
263a4(mdo sde): dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs
263a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sdug gu las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra
263a6(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
263a7(mdo sde): ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
263b1(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
263b2(mdo sde): gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam
263b3(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//
263b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
263b5(mdo sde): bde bar ga shegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes
263b6(mdo sde): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
263b7(mdo sde): thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis
264a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang
264a2(mdo sde): du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig gis
264a3(mdo sde): rgyal po la gsol to// bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/
264a4(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
264a5(mdo sde): kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
264a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed
264a7(mdo sde): ba des ni/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar
264b1(mdo sde): na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par/
264b2(mdo sde): dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs
264b3(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag
264b4(mdo sde): yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon
264b5(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyir rnams dang /
264b6(mdo sde): ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang /
264b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
265a1(mdo sde): na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdun dang / spun gsos dang / sran zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na/
265a2(mdo sde): shIng n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser sna'i gnas na shAkya byug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi
265a3(mdo sde): bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de
265a4(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra
265a5(mdo sde): pab/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig bcas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston
265a6(mdo sde): byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i mig pad+ma 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdags so//
265a7(mdo sde): zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma
265b1(mdo sde): brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang so byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtshan/
265b2(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba
265b3(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi
265b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do// de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u pad+ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
265b5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba
265b6(mdo sde): lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos
265b7(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
266a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de sbu bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu le/
266a2(mdo sde): shes rdo rjes bcom nus/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
266a3(mdo sde): bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas
266a4(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
266a5(mdo sde): chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngom sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas
266a6(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
266a7(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis
266b1(mdo sde): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas re zhig de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bsdus nas ngo tsha bar gyur to// de nas pad+ma'i riH/
266b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
266b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes de yin pas na med par bya mi nus so// de lta mod kyi/ ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong
266b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun
266b5(mdo sde): pa pad+ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i mig nyid
266b6(mdo sde): kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon ma za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig
266b7(mdo sde): nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
267a1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
267a2(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/
267a3(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dgra sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin
267a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
267a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa
267a6(mdo sde): las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya
267a7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che
267b1(mdo sde): sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur/
267b2(mdo sde): ste byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs nas/ des de'i nang nas nor bu rin po che
267b3(mdo sde): mthon ka chen po zhig khyer nas 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das
267b4(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so// me tog
267b5(mdo sde): pad+ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
267b6(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nged dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma'i
267b7(mdo sde): mig 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo //
268a1(mdo sde): pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni mig bad+ma sngon po lta bur gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
268a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
268a3(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
268a4(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
268a5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rnga s+tha zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
268a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
268a7(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur gyi byas/ bla mar byas/
268b1(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
268b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
268b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
268b4(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dgal
268b5(mdo sde): la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nasade zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la
268b6(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa/ bya ka la bing ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig bces so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags
268b7(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rnga sba lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u rnga sgra pa na
269a1(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu mu bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'dru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis/
269a2(mdo sde): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang
269a3(mdo sde): ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba
269a4(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go// de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u rnga sgra shis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
269a5(mdo sde): sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga'
269a6(mdo sde): bo rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang bar mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
269a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin
269b1(mdo sde): thugs su chud ras/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de zos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
269b2(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang /
269b3(mdo sde): bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams ni tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad
269b4(mdo sde): pas pho la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
269b5(mdo sde): chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas
269b6(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa
269b7(mdo sde): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha
