270a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
270a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags
270a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las
270a4(mdo sde): de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
270a5(mdo sde): ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing
270a6(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi
270a7(mdo sde): za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin
270b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba / tha na/
270b2(mdo sde): med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las
270b3(mdo sde): re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
270b4(mdo sde): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i
270b5(mdo sde): mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma sa bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang
270b6(mdo sde): thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas/ de dag ma
270b7(mdo sde): rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti byed do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di/
271a1(mdo sde): yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la
271a2(mdo sde): rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par
271a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro//
271a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge
271a5(mdo sde): slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
271a6(mdo sde): bstod do// bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor
271a7(mdo sde): gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding
271b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang ga lha ma/
271b2(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang //
271b3(mdo sde): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / skur gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
271b4(mdo sde): ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i
271b5(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gra pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung mo blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig su rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur smad do//
271b6(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te/ bu bcas nas sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang / khyim de na
271b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i gzhan dag dang / g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu bcas pa yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs
272a1(mdo sde): te/ lag pa oM tshugs bcas nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin su la bsnyad par bya/ shes pa su yod snyam mo// de nas de'i blo skyes pa/
272a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom
272a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ sha sdug
272a4(mdo sde): bu de ras bal legs par rmal ba'i nang du chug la/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du lag pas brums te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang / de'i 'og tu
272a5(mdo sde): rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te bsams pa/
272a6(mdo sde): bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste//
272a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ chen po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ de nas re zhig na mthar gyis
272b1(mdo sde): bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te phan tshun 'khyam pa las/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs/
272b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas
272b3(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom
272b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang /
272b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i mthon po nyi shu
272b6(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nus/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
272b7(mdo sde): ngo // de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pa'i phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad
273a1(mdo sde): rnyil pa dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid/
273a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan
273a3(mdo sde): pa/ can dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
273a4(mdo sde): chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes
273a5(mdo sde): te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzhon du brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la chen po che'i stobs dang
273a6(mdo sde): ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la
273a7(mdo sde): gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas/ de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
273b1(mdo sde): slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'ju/
273b2(mdo sde): te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las
273b3(mdo sde): rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud miza// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
273b4(mdo sde): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su snun pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
273b5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i
273b6(mdo sde): brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i
273b7(mdo sde): me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung
274a1(mdo sde): gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyung grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs
274a2(mdo sde): te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang / de dag gis mchod
274a3(mdo sde): rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / mar me dbul/
274a4(mdo sde): pa dag gis bster bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lho gcig kho na nas 'byung bar gyur
274a5(mdo sde): cig/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyu/
274a6(mdo sde): cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni chen po che 'di dag yin te/
274a7(mdo sde): de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu/
274b1(mdo sde): 'thun par rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag pa
274b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur
274b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge
274b4(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
274b5(mdo sde): bam po bcu drug pa// / nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug
274b6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam
274b7(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
275a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / skyo 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
275a2(mdo sde): ldan pa na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na
275a3(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas nu shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya
275a4(mdo sde): ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
275a5(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste ga khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta
275a6(mdo sde): na sdug la mdzes pa/ nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig bces nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser
275a7(mdo sde): spyi'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnams dang / ser skya'i
275b1(mdo sde): gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes
275b2(mdo sde): ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u de btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du gsal bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes
275b3(mdo sde): gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u nyi ma phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'bru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsa ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma
275b4(mdo sde): brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
275b5(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can
275b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/
275b7(mdo sde): de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/
276a1(mdo sde): dpe bya bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyad pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba
276a2(mdo sde): mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
276a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
276a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/
276a5(mdo sde): des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom
276a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pa'i khol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad
276a7(mdo sde): rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/
276b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ can dang spangs pa lta bur
276b2(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti
276b3(mdo sde): la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe
276b4(mdo sde): bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la/ lkog 'phyas byed de/ da 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo
276b5(mdo sde): dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o// bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to// de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan
276b6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabos la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin
276b7(mdo sde): po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so// de lta mod kyi/ ci nas dad pa dang
277a1(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom
277a2(mdo sde): skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
277a3(mdo sde): legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
277a4(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
277a5(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags
277a6(mdo sde): pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskul pa brgyar yang chud mi za// chos
277a7(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
277b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
277b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs
277b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
277b4(mdo sde): 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod
277b5(mdo sde): la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho risi dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rten de'i
277b6(mdo sde): mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ga ba dan dang //
277b7(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo// de nas de dad pa skyes nas
278a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed
278a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed
278a3(mdo sde): par ma gyur cig/ nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du mu'i lho nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du
278a4(mdo sde): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti de byas pa dang / nor bu rin
278a5(mdo sde): po che btags pa des na/ de'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
278a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam
278a7(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
278b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / las 'dren pa rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
278b2(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gyad kyis ba dan zhes bya ba ni//
278b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnam
278b4(mdo sde): dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
278b5(mdo sde): byasabla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
278b6(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zeng rnams brnyed pa
278b7(mdo sde): nyam thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mangs longs spyod che ba/
279a1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/
279a2(mdo sde): de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs
279a3(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha 'dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig bcas te/ gang gi tshe khye'u de bcas pa 'di'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag
279a4(mdo sde): bsgrengs so// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad drug kyang brdungs so// lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / bad+ma dang / ku mu dA dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gat+tar t+te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad/
279a5(mdo sde): du grags pas rgyas par gyur to// khyim thams cad du'ang de'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo // de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de//
279a6(mdo sde): nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di bces pa na 'jig rten thams cad na grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u snyan grags pa na 'tsho ba'i
279a7(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang / ru ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang /
279b1(mdo sde): zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yod byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dang pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing
279b2(mdo sde): bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar
279b3(mdo sde): song ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis
279b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga'
279b5(mdo sde): ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la
279b6(mdo sde): nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
279b7(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthong po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge sbyong dang
280a1(mdo sde): bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa/
280a2(mdo sde): dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
280a3(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i
280a4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas/
280a5(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang
280a6(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'ang gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i gos spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul
280a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba'i zas dang / ma la cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong spyod do// gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung
280b1(mdo sde): du spyod do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsam thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des bces mthag/
280b2(mdo sde): tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrengs nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
280b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
280b4(mdo sde): bsags pas na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol
280b5(mdo sde): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
280b6(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//
280b7(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa
281a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
281a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las / re zhig
281a3(mdo sde): na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
281a4(mdo sde): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten
281a5(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nasamatho ris dang thar par
281a6(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyis ba dan dag bsgreng ngo //
281a7(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyang gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna
281b1(mdo sde): tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog/
281b2(mdo sde): shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par
281b3(mdo sde): ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyang du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/ res bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten
281b4(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor bar bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar 'gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las
281b5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par
281b6(mdo sde): dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams sdung /
281b7(mdo sde): la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge
282a1(mdo sde): slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas mngon par bsod do// gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las
282a2(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs su brjod pa bdun pa rdzogs so// sdom nI/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma// dkar mo zla ba ut+pa
282a3(mdo sde): la/ mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang // ka tsang ga la bde byed ma// mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan// 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang /
282a4(mdo sde): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams
282a5(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te
282a6(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
282a7(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
282b1(mdo sde): yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas spyir gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che/
282b2(mdo sde): bayongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas
282b3(mdo sde): de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzug
282b4(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa/ nor bu rin che mgul na thogs pa zhig bcas te/ de nas 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so//
282b5(mdo sde): de nas de bcas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di bcas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od
282b6(mdo sde): kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo 'ong bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
282b7(mdo sde): nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
283a1(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yod byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyeng bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// bu mo de'ang dad pa/
283a2(mdo sde): dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang su 'ongs kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te/
283a3(mdo sde): sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yang rgyar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong
283a4(mdo sde): dpon gyi bu mang po dag de song du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi/
283a5(mdo sde): dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re zhig na bu mo nges pa sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing
283a6(mdo sde): bzhugs// des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas phyis bu mo de na re/ yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab gdam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro//
283a7(mdo sde): de nas tshong dpon nges rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol nas/ mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid kyi khyim tha ba 'dam par chad kyis/ khyed kyi bya
283b1(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing na la zhon te/ chos gos chom can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
283b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so// de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba
283b3(mdo sde): de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyes ni mi 'tshal na/ yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma
283b4(mdo sde): lags pa kho na bas so// bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas/ de dag phyir log go// bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
283b5(mdo sde): song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
283b6(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
283b7(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa'ang bsgrubs so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma
284a1(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
284a2(mdo sde): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i
284a3(mdo sde): dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar byas pa mang po dag des
284a4(mdo sde): 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
284a5(mdo sde): nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzung bar byas so// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma
284a6(mdo sde): de dag gis bsnyams pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu
284a7(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas/ sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du
284b1(mdo sde): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa btab pa/ su mar spyon/ mar spyon/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so//
284b2(mdo sde): de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
284b3(mdo sde): bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/ des de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
284b4(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig
284b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par zad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
284b6(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag ma thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
284b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod
285a1(mdo sde): cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus
285a2(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis ni/ nges gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul ba nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom
285a3(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
285a4(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar
285a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
285a6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag/
285a7(mdo sde): gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
285b1(mdo sde): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
285b2(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan
285b3(mdo sde): ni rten cing bzhugs pa la sa/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag
285b4(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po
285b5(mdo sde): che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun
285b6(mdo sde): mo pad+ma rgas nas/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/ mchod rten de la phul lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed
285b7(mdo sde): pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
286a1(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
286a2(mdo sde): kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab
286a3(mdo sde): pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
286a4(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de
286a5(mdo sde): lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis
286a6(mdo sde): de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
286a7(mdo sde): rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
286b1(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang
286b2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byasamachod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
286b3(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / sun gsos
286b4(mdo sde): dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
286b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag
286b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhig bces so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas ga bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad ga dgra
286b7(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de'ang tshe rabs dran ce/
287a1(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung // zhing gi khyad par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te
287a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten du// dad pas lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas byin// de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing sngangs te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/
287a3(mdo sde): skye bung zhes byed nas smras pa/ kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go// de smras pa/ yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag
287a4(mdo sde): sbyin par 'tshal lo// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo des 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan
287a5(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin rabs gdon du bcug go// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ pha ma la
287a6(mdo sde): gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / 'phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to// re zhig na de'i tshe ru/
287a7(mdo sde): ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o// de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
287b1(mdo sde): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la ngan re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang // nad gsos dang /
287b2(mdo sde): sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi
287b3(mdo sde): bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig bka' stsal to// de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
287b4(mdo sde): spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so// de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so// de nas re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
287b5(mdo sde): gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab sdug ma gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzla ba gsum gyi b.radra
287b6(mdo sde): zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so// rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te
287b7(mdo sde): yab bden pa mthong ba lags la/ sa'i 'og thog thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan
288a1(mdo sde): gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do// de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo 'breng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo
288a2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi bu drang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang / ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so// de nas nags
288a3(mdo sde): khung du song nas der mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o// de ltar skabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na
288a4(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sran zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang / bsgrub
288a5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyim pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam
288a6(mdo sde): par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar
288a7(mdo sde): gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/
288b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i rtsa
288b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas/ chos gos
288b3(mdo sde): gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so// de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan du dang
288b4(mdo sde): lam du phrad nas/ 'o brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab na ngargyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
288b5(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to// de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed/
288b6(mdo sde): bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge slong gi dge
288b7(mdo sde): 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams
289a1(mdo sde): byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
289a2(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur
289a3(mdo sde): la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab sdug me nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing
289a4(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su
289a5(mdo sde): zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang
289a6(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin
289a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud miza// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag
289b1(mdo sde): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
289b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong
289b3(mdo sde): khyer wA rA NA sa~M na/ drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ srung
289b4(mdo sde): bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas wA rA NA sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te
289b5(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag khyer te/ de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te rje bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las/ bu mo mngag
289b6(mdo sde): gzhug ma des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa/ bdag la rje bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis/ bdag
289b7(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsngos nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan
290a1(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb
290a2(mdo sde): deg re zhes dris so// des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu
290a3(mdo sde): ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod deng phyin chad bran mo las phyung gis song zhig/ khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyi log pa na mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes
290a4(mdo sde): smras so// de nas des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar ci snang zhes byas so// de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin
290a5(mdo sde): nas/ de rje bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung na/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta pa'i
290a6(mdo sde): las byas te/ 'bras chan dang / skyo ma dang / thug pa btung ba dang / rtag res 'khor dang / mgron du bod pa dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / chos gos srang brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang /
290a7(mdo sde): rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
290b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
290b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la zhal zas phul ba des
290b3(mdo sde): na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
290b4(mdo sde): byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnog pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par
290b5(mdo sde): smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
290b6(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
290b7(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal
291a1(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams
291a2(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/
291a3(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
291a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
291a5(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ shAkya rdzar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mngal
291a6(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang
291a7(mdo sde): nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de de dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod kyang / bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med de/ lag pa oM tshugs bcas nas bsams
291b1(mdo sde): pa bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur/
291b2(mdo sde): ro snyam ste/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lhas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cag/
291b3(mdo sde): ces de la bsgo'o// de nas de bu med de/ bu 'dod pas gu lang dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / sna'i khyad par gzhan dag lnga'ang gsol
291b4(mdo sde): ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i
291b5(mdo sde): lha dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes
291b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lha ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong
291b7(mdo sde): yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhes na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus
292a1(mdo sde): la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri zla 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'dri gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'ang gsol pa 'debs pa
292a2(mdo sde): skur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/ de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas/ des khyim tha ba la sbran to// de nas khyim thab kyis
292a3(mdo sde): smras pa bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni/ de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtang ngo // de nas re zhig na de
292a4(mdo sde): ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi
292a5(mdo sde): mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so// de nas re zhig na shAkya snar mas khyod chung ma la bu byung ste/ bu mo zhig bces so zhes thos pa dang / de khros te nang du song ngo // de nas de'i chung mas
292a6(mdo sde): lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo// de nas shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags
292a7(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du bcas pa sa na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo dkar
292b1(mdo sde): mo pang na 'tsha ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ shA ma ma brgyad la gtang nas/ de ma ma brgyad
292b2(mdo sde): kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dung / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ba cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye dag
292b3(mdo sde): par gyur to// bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste/ dri ma can du'ang mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la'ang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo
292b4(mdo sde): dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mang po de dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gi gnod par gyur nas/
292b5(mdo sde): de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re zhig na bu mo
292b6(mdo sde): des pa sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs de nas de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do// de nas bu mo na re/
292b7(mdo sde): yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
293a1(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na nges pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gos gang dag gyon te bcas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang
293a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de nas des brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil
293a3(mdo sde): ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te
293a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta
293a5(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i srubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang /
293a6(mdo sde): bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom
293a7(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
293b1(mdo sde): gos dkar mo gyon pa dang / rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
293b2(mdo sde): dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dkar po nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de/
293b3(mdo sde): dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyurachu'i khams dang / me'i
293b4(mdo sde): khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba'
293b5(mdo sde): zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/
293b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang na bas su ldan pa/
293b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa / 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
294a1(mdo sde): byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam/
294a2(mdo sde): pa bzang zhing 'dug pa don zhig la drang srong smra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang
294a3(mdo sde): po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu
294a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa
294a5(mdo sde): rnyed de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du ba shos gsol nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo// de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol
294a6(mdo sde): tebacom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/
294a7(mdo sde): des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na/ gos dkar mo bzhin du bcas so// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
294b1(mdo sde): du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// mas gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ning /
294b2(mdo sde): bar smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge sdang dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnam
294b3(mdo sde): dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par byaste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
294b4(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
294b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang ga lha rnams/
294b6(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas//
294b7(mdo sde): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
295a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pan bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
295a2(mdo sde): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan
295a3(mdo sde): du yod pa na/ bram ze phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas/
295a4(mdo sde): so// de'ang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ ming gi rnam grangs dang / shes gsal dang bcas pa dang / yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang / lnga pa ste/ gtam rgyud dang / bcas pa rnams
295a5(mdo sde): tshig re re nas brda sprod nus pa zhig go// de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do// de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
295a6(mdo sde): nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
295a7(mdo sde): bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags
295b1(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo rma
295b2(mdo sde): ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis
295b3(mdo sde): 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur
295b4(mdo sde): to// de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// /
295b5(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na de'i pha bram ze'i khye'u rnams sngags slob pa na de thos pa tsam gyis lobs so// thos nas kyang bstan chos de dag lha 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chad nus so// de nas de'i grags
295b6(mdo sde): pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do// de nas gang
295b7(mdo sde): gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkhas pa rnams dang / mkhas
296a1(mdo sde): par grags pa de dag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do// de nas de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa kye ci'i phyir da
296a2(mdo sde): bstan chos shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de dag gis smras pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/ de dag thams cad de la gzhol
296a3(mdo sde): bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/ de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so// de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/ bcom ldan
296a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa
296a5(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
296a6(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin
296a7(mdo sde): thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
296b1(mdo sde): bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo // de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang /
296b2(mdo sde): 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par
296b3(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
296b4(mdo sde): bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa lta bu bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
296b5(mdo sde): bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang da/
296b6(mdo sde): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed
296b7(mdo sde): phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung
297a1(mdo sde): dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
297a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung 'bog par mi mdzad de/ gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig
297a3(mdo sde): yod na ni ngas lung dbog go// de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
297a4(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lan cig bka' stsal pas bdag gis bzung bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis so
297a5(mdo sde): sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog pa mdzad nas
297a6(mdo sde): lan cig bka' stsal pa dge slong ma zla bas lo bas so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang //
297a7(mdo sde): thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
297b1(mdo sde): btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / zos pa 'dzin par gyur lags
297b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba
297b3(mdo sde): las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
297b4(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags
297b5(mdo sde): pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
297b6(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe ma nyi khri thub pa na/ yang
297b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
298a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so//
298a2(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des de la lung ma nos te bslabs nas/ kha ton du byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang
298a3(mdo sde): khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas so// mthar thug pa'i ye shes
298a4(mdo sde): ni bskyed ma nus so// de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// de nas dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon
298a5(mdo sde): lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i
298a6(mdo sde): khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
298a7(mdo sde): zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig
298b1(mdo sde): ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/ nges
298b2(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa des na/ zos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// des der lung mnos te bslabs nas kha ton du byas pa des na/ de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
298b3(mdo sde): so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
298b4(mdo sde): pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams la/ las
298b5(mdo sde): 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
298b6(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // ut+pa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
298b7(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
299a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod/
299a2(mdo sde): pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
299a3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
299a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshe la bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / yid 'ong gnyis phrad
