328b4(mdo sde): zhes byas so// de nas tshong pa de dag gis rinu po che dag blangs nas 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas so// de nas re zhig na srin po nag po'i rlung gis kun tu bskor ba las drang
328b5(mdo sde): srong ngos yongs su bskyabs so// de nas gru'i don grub ste/ nye zho med par phyir 'khor nas drang srong gri zad du phyin te smras pa/ kye drang srong chen po dka' bas 'bad pa dang / snying
328b6(mdo sde): rje'i rang bzhin 'dis ci zhig bsgrub cing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams grol ba dang //
328b7(mdo sde): ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sangs rgyas su
329a1(mdo sde): gyur cig ces byas so// de dag gis smras pa/ nam khyod sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang dgongs par gsol/ drang srong gis smras pa/ de ltar bya'o//
329a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no// tshong pa de dag ni rgya mtsho la sogs pa 'di dag yin
329a3(mdo sde): te/ de'i tshe'ang ngas 'di dag yongs su bskyabs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung ste/ der de dag gis dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar
329a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges
329a5(mdo sde): bar dkar ba rnams ni nam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges pa ra dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges
329a6(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan
329a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// snga ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
329b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
329b2(mdo sde): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas
329b3(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
329b4(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/
329b5(mdo sde): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi cha la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
329b6(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nasade de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
329b7(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ bu bces so cog shi'o// de'i tshe gnas brtan ma 'gags pa ni khyim der 'phrul lo// de nas khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/
330a1(mdo sde): gnas brtan ma 'gags pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas che bar grags pa yin gyis/ gal te bdag gi bu bcas par gyur na/ 'di'i slob mar dbul lo
330a2(mdo sde): zhes 'di la je gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag des gnas brtan ma 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du spyan drangs te/ ba shos gsol nas gsol ba btab pa/ gnas brtan gal te
330a3(mdo sde): bdag bu bcas te ma gum na gnas brtan gyi slob mar dbul mo zhes byas so// gnas brtan ma 'gags pas spras pa// de ltar dam bcas pa ma brjed par gyis shig/ de nas phyis re zhig na yang rtse
330a4(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de'i lus la dri bsung zhim po byung bar gyur to// de nas re zhig na zla ba brgyad dam dgu
330a5(mdo sde): lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung gyon pa zhig btsas so// de nas de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ sna ma zhes ming
330a6(mdo sde): btags so// de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs nas khye'u de de la phul lo// de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pas de la chos gos tshon can dag byin te/ tshe ring ba
330a7(mdo sde): gyur cig ces legs su smon pa'ang byas so// de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas mo bdun lon pa de'i tshe pha ma gnyis kyis gnas brtan ma 'gags pa la phul lo// gnas brtan ma 'gags pas
330b1(mdo sde): kyang rab tu phyung nas yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed/
330b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par byang chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas ka dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
330b3(mdo sde): sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa ka can
330b4(mdo sde): ngan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa
330b5(mdo sde): deng / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'ang dbang po rnon po zhig ste/ gang gi tshe
330b6(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'dzub pa de'i tshe/ khab lan re 'dzugs pa la rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed do// de nas phyis re zhig na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bsgo ba/
330b7(mdo sde): bu gcig song la chu klung khang ldan nas chu mong zhig ces byas so// de nas dge tshul pa snga mas bum pa khyer te chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song ngo // de nas khrus byas te/ bum pa chus bkang
331a1(mdo sde): nas nam mkha' la byung ste/ ched 'ga' ni bum pa sngon du btang la/ dge tshul pa snga ma phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // ched 'ga' ni dge tshul ba snga ma sngon du 'gro la bum pa phyi
331a2(mdo sde): bzhin 'ong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nasa'akhor bzhi po rnams la chos bston te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
331a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dge tshul pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ dbang po shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa bum pa chus bkang ste 'ong ba 'di mthong ngam/ 'dod chags zhe sdang rab grangs shing //
331a4(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang bral nas ni// lus kyi tha ma 'jid byed pa// de ni chu chun rab tu mdzes// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du dge tshul bsdam bstod cing bcwas/
331a5(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sna ma 'dis las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing
331a6(mdo sde): bsta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / lha'i snga ma'i me tog gi ral chung 'tshal bzhin du skyes la/ dbang po rno ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
331a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snga ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyer grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgas bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
331b1(mdo sde): shIng bsags pas nA/ snga ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi
331b2(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
331b3(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//
331b4(mdo sde): tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngan byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs/
331b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
331b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen yod na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na deng
331b7(mdo sde): dpon zhig gnas pa de gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab tu byung ba'i sems skyes pa las/ de rab tu 'byung ma nus nas/ gang gi tshe rgas par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod pa skyes te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das
332a1(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu ma byung ba ni bdag gis ma legs par byas so snyam mo// de nas des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la snga ma'i me tog btags so// yang dag/
332a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la'ang ba shos gsol te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
332a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes
332a4(mdo sde): par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba der gzhon nu'i tshe nas 'phags pa'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so//
332a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi ring la rab tu byung ste/ des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//
332a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig
332a7(mdo sde): tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma
332b1(mdo sde): rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par byaste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de sar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
332b2(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lag na gser thogs zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
332b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
332b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas
332b5(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ skra dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
332b6(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams
332b7(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe
333a1(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i/
333a2(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de la bu'ang med/ bu mo'ang med pas// de lag po la o ma tshugs bcas te/ bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin gyis kyang / bdag la bu'ang med
333a3(mdo sde): bu mo'ang med pas/ bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas dge sbyong
333a4(mdo sde): dang / bram ze dang / lhas mkhan dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o// 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus
333a5(mdo sde): bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/ de'ang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
333a6(mdo sde): rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod
333a7(mdo sde): chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so//
333b1(mdo sde): de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi rigs shig nas shi 'phos nas/ de'i chung ma'i sngor bzhugs so// bud med mkhas
333b2(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags pa'ang shes la/ ma chags pa'ang shes pa dang / dus kyang shes la
333b3(mdo sde): zla mtshan yang shes pa dang bu chags pa yang shes pa dang / gang las bu gnas pa shes pa dang / khye'u yang shes la/ bu mo'ang shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na ni lho
333b4(mdo sde): g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so// gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so// de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/ jo bo bdag la sras
333b5(mdo sde): chags te/ bdag gi ru ma g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis/ dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so// de'ang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg/
333b6(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag
333b7(mdo sde): gi bya ba dag byed par shog tsi// gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig/ nor skal la spyod par shog cig / khag gi rigs rgyun ring du gnas par shog cig/ bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i
334a1(mdo sde): 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyi mang yang rung / nyung yang ste/ sbyin pa dag byin la/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song /
334a2(mdo sde): zhig ces yon sngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// de nas des bu chags par rig nas/ bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i tshe
334a3(mdo sde): grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang / che ba'i tshe che ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang sgyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
334a4(mdo sde): cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bsku ba ma yin pa rnams te/ kha ba dang / sgyur ba dang / lan/
334a5(mdo sde): tshwa dang / dngar ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo ngos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin
334a6(mdo sde): khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang / khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing / 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci'ang mi thos par byas so// de nas zla ba brgyad dam
334a7(mdo sde): dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ de'i lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las
334b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung ste ga/ gang gi tshe de phyung ba de'i tshe/ yang gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming /
334b2(mdo sde): ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de ga nye du rnams na reg 'di bcas ma thag tu lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse gnyis byung bas na/ de'i
334b3(mdo sde): phyir na khye'u 'di'i ming lag na gser thogs zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs pa ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
334b4(mdo sde): 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas / de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo
334b5(mdo sde): byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la
334b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ snying rje can zhig ste gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams mthong na lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ de la
334b7(mdo sde): gser dngul gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to// de nas phyis
335a1(mdo sde): re zhig na khye'u lag na gser thogs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
335a2(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyar pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
335a3(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
335a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa slob dpon bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
335a5(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol bar 'tshal lo// gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa bu kar sha pa Na dgos so// de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
335a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'grengs te/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spungs so// de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang / dge slong gzhan dag dang
335a7(mdo sde): gnas brtan kun dga' bos de mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to// de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun pa shos gsol nas
335b1(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas// 'phags/
335b2(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u la ga na gser thogs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas
335b3(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas/ des nye du rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang
335b4(mdo sde): sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas po la mig
335b5(mdo sde): lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
335b6(mdo sde): can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
335b7(mdo sde): nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa
336a1(mdo sde): rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang /
336a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
336a3(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lag na gser thogs kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i sug pa gnyis la gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung la/ rab tu byung
336a4(mdo sde): nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag na gser thogs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs
336a5(mdo sde): rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ lag na gser thogs nyid kyis las byas shing
336a6(mdo sde): bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur//
336a7(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung
336b1(mdo sde): bo dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus pa
336b2(mdo sde): bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/
336b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo /
336b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas
336b5(mdo sde): kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag
336b6(mdo sde): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po kr-i kris de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa
336b7(mdo sde): mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshod gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten de'i dus ston byed pa na/ rgyan po pa zhig gis gser gyi rong
337a1(mdo sde): tse gnyis mchod rten de'i srog shing la btags so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lag pa/
337a2(mdo sde): la gser yod pa kho nar gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po par gyur pa de ni lag na
337a3(mdo sde): gser thogs 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la gser gyi dong tse gnyis btags pa des na 'di lta bu'i khyad par can du gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid
337a4(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par/
337a5(mdo sde): dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dge de bas na las
337a6(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab
337a7(mdo sde): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /
337b1(mdo sde): bam po bcu dgu pa/ sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang
337b2(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
337b3(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
337b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
337b5(mdo sde): dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
337b6(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /
337b7(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa bzhi pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang /
338a1(mdo sde): nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la ga bu gcig pa
338a2(mdo sde): la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas re zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa lasabatsun
338a3(mdo sde): mo la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la/ dge slong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so//
338a4(mdo sde): nas skyes ma thag tu dris pa/ ci mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang / 'od srungs dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan
338a5(mdo sde): thos chen po rnams bzhugs sam zhes zer ro// de nas de'i ma ya mtshan du gyur te/ dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa/ bu mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen
338a6(mdo sde): po rnams bzhugs so zhes byas so// de nas re zhig na don de rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te/ khyod kyi sras gos su chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe
338a7(mdo sde): rabs dran pa zhig bcas te/ de bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams ga la bzhugs pa'ang rmed do zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu de la phan gdags
338b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ dge slong gi dge
338b2(mdo sde): 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bkang sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas ko sa la'i
338b3(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu phang bar blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar brims so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di bcas ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams
338b4(mdo sde): dran lags so zhes gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu de la sde snod gsum pa khyod nad med par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
338b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal mchog tu ya ma chen du gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ chos gos
338b6(mdo sde): tshon can de dag nyid gyon bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi
338b7(mdo sde): brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsang tshad de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
339a1(mdo sde): nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha
339a2(mdo sde): dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
339a3(mdo sde): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i
339a4(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sde snod gsum pas las gang dag bgyis na
339a5(mdo sde): des chos gos tshon can 'tshal la/ dge slong gi tshe lugs can tshe rabs dran bzhin du bcas te/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das
339a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar
339a7(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas
339b1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te ga las dge ba
339b2(mdo sde): dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal
339b3(mdo sde): pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid
339b4(mdo sde): la skye dgu'i tshe mo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
339b5(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing
339b6(mdo sde): bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po kri kri'i bu drang srong smra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
339b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang
340a1(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag dad pa bskyes so// dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
340a2(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'khor ba las skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
340a3(mdo sde): chos bstan te/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du blta bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po la gsol te/ yab bdag bcom ldan 'das
340a4(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ring po mi thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas
340a5(mdo sde): 'di ni ngas bcos su med do// bus smras pa/ rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyis/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
340a6(mdo sde): tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo // de nas yab kyis ma gnang nas des zhag gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum nas/ zhag drug gi bar du kha 'chos so// de nas de'i bla grogs
340a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ sras 'di rab tu byung na legs kyi/ de'u re 'dir 'gum na ma legs so// de nas rgyal pos gnang nas dam
340b1(mdo sde): 'char bcug ste/ nam khyod sde snod gsum ma lobs kyi bar dung dang 'phrad du ma 'ong zhig ces bsgo'o// de nas re zhig na de yab kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
340b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs he/ rig pa dang grol bar smra ba chos ston par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du
340b3(mdo sde): sems te/ ma la bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgu ma gor ma chag snyam nas/ de yab kyi thad du song sde phrad nas dris pa/ bu cung zad lobs pa lnga yod dam/ des smras pa/
340b4(mdo sde): sde snod gsum lobs lags so// de nas des yab la chos de lta bu bstan te/ de thos nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to// de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/ bu gcig khyod la
340b5(mdo sde): ci dgos des smras pa bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug 'bul lo// rgyal pos spras pa/ rgyas bar po brang ni rgya ches ci dga' ba gyis
340b6(mdo sde): shig/ de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor nyi khri dang bcas te/ zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/ dge slong re re la'ang yo byad drug drug phul
340b7(mdo sde): lo// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur
341a1(mdo sde): sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du smras pa de dang der/
341a2(mdo sde): gos su chosna tshon can gyon la/ dge sbyong gi chu lugs 'di dang ldan to// tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji nyam
341a3(mdo sde): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kri kri'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing bldan
341a4(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur to// dge slong dag de lhur na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par gyur ro//
341a5(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro//
341a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtang par bya ste/
341a7(mdo sde): dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
341b1(mdo sde): par baspyod do// / grags bshes zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams/
341b2(mdo sde): dang / pho drang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang
341b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
341b4(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
341b5(mdo sde): bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
341b6(mdo sde): tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
341b7(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse
342a1(mdo sde): zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pabyung ste/ spong bas kyang mi zas mi rnyed do// sus mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi
342a2(mdo sde): 'bab par bstan pa las/ re zhig na ded dpon de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag
342a3(mdo sde): dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/ gang gi nyin par khye'u de bcas pa de kho na'i nyin par nas than pa med par gyur to// de nas de'i grags pa mnyan du yod pa
342a4(mdo sde): mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to// de nas de bcas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di'i grags pa
342a5(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u grags pa shes phang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma
342a6(mdo sde): gnyis dang / dri ma 'bru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying //
342a7(mdo sde): bu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gris bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i
342b1(mdo sde): tshe / rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe
342b2(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/
342b3(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas
342b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par blta ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du
342b5(mdo sde): blta bar gyur te/ pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor
342b6(mdo sde): lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad
342b7(mdo sde): chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang
343a1(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
343a2(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba
343a3(mdo sde): dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa byung ste/ des na de la
343a4(mdo sde): sgom pa'i gnod pa med de/ gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong sgom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i tshe'ang de mi 'ong ngo // de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams
343a5(mdo sde): kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod med ces byas so// des smras pa/ bdag gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/ des na bdag ni skom pa'i
343a6(mdo sde): gnod pa med do// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa grags pa shes 'dis las gang dag bgyis
343a7(mdo sde): na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mche ba gnyis las chab yang lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/ rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis
343b1(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag grags pa shes nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin/
343b2(mdo sde): du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsngags pas nA/ grags bshes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar
343b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par
343b4(mdo sde): smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur
343b5(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon
343b6(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
343b7(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
344a1(mdo sde): ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dwags kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re zhig na tsho dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu
344a2(mdo sde): byung ba las/ de'ang le lo can zhig ste/ gzhan la de bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do// de nas tshangs pa mi tshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyi bsnyen bkur byed par
344a3(mdo sde): bskos pa dang / de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin to// dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pa nas/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad/
344a4(mdo sde): de phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud nas/ de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste/ bdag gi/
344a5(mdo sde): chu snod kyi drung du song na chu med par mthong ngo // de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo // de nas re zhig na chu
344a6(mdo sde): klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de yang chu med par gyur te/ de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang / dad pas byin pa lci bar
344a7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/ ras shig der btags nas/ rang gi las rnams bsams te/ las la rton cing 'dug go// de nas
344b1(mdo sde): re zhig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs pa dang / gtam de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do// de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas/
344b2(mdo sde): mi dga' bar gyur te/ phan tshun du bsnyad do// de nas de'i mkhan pos chu byin na de'ang ma mthong ngo // de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs la gsol
344b3(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis gaN+DI rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas khang skyong gi sa gan+d+hi brdungs pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
344b4(mdo sde): rnams 'dus so// grong khyer wA rA NA si thig thag tu yang gtam de grags te/ sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so// de nas re zhig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du
344b5(mdo sde): 'dug tu bcug nas/ ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang ste byin nas/ bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so// de nas 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur
344b6(mdo sde): pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i
344b7(mdo sde): phyir phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na/ 'on kyang
345a1(mdo sde): zad par ma gyur to// dge 'dun thams cad la brims na'ang zad par ma gyur to// de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan can de mthong
345a2(mdo sde): nas/ srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to// de'i rgyud la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chud par gyur to// gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe/ des sangs rgyas
345a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/ lo khri nyis stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brims so// de nas byis re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe smon lam
345a4(mdo sde): btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i
345a5(mdo sde): khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin/
345a6(mdo sde): pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so//
345a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags bshes 'di yin te/ des lo khri nyis stong
345b1(mdo sde): gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na/ tshe 'di la mche ba'i phrag nas chu 'byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar
345b2(mdo sde): na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges
345b3(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams
345b4(mdo sde): spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
345b5(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
345b6(mdo sde): la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnam
345b7(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
346a1(mdo sde): byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing /
346a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
346a3(mdo sde): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus rtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na/ rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du
346a4(mdo sde): dbyar gnas par dam pa zhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni mnyan du yod
346a5(mdo sde): pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
346a6(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos
346a7(mdo sde): kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du ma sa yang dag par/
346b1(mdo sde): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod / yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'jug go// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las yangs te//
346b2(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras
346b3(mdo sde): so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa cung zad gsan tam/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras
346b4(mdo sde): pakye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng
346b5(mdo sde): du dbyar gnas par dam pazhes te/ sku bskrun pa'i yum dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la'ang chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos so// de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams
346b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon par bstan cing rjes su yi rangs te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas 'khor bzhi po
346b7(mdo sde): rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
347a1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du
347a2(mdo sde): bcug/ yang dag par gzengs stong/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs
347a3(mdo sde): bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
347a4(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bcud de/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad
347a5(mdo sde): du gsol/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das
347a6(mdo sde): mthong bar 'tshal te/ gal te btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ zhabs
347a7(mdo sde): la phyag pa zhes te gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la
347b1(mdo sde): reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/ 'di skad du
347b2(mdo sde): btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum
347b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la mi gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / zang du
347b4(mdo sde): mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas
347b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes mol du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so//
347b6(mdo sde): de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
347b7(mdo sde): te stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs
348a1(mdo sde): po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ sum cu
348a2(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snum bu dkar po lta bur 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
348a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos
348a4(mdo sde): ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dzum dmul te/ bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na ni 'khor mang po dang bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas bcom
348a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang
348a6(mdo sde): dbang med de/ gang gi tshe ngas deng zhig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe ngas shog cig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems kyis nga'i bsams
348a7(mdo sde): pab shes nas 'ong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
348b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
348b2(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khor lags so// lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes
348b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang mchis so// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so//
348b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par dgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi
348b5(mdo sde): bu de ni de bzhin te/ de ni de bzhin no// kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral
348b6(mdo sde): nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag
348b7(mdo sde): kyang yod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa
349a1(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing /
349a2(mdo sde): 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyi nang nas sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa
349a3(mdo sde): dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do// de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang
349a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u/
349a5(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas
349a6(mdo sde): 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag yod do// chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dang ba dang ldan te/ lus dang bral ras 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do//
349a7(mdo sde): de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
349b1(mdo sde): bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lags so// lha gzhan dag cag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag ni chos dang /
349b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa lags so// de nas der rtsa brgya phrag du ma dang / lha stong phrag du ma dang /
349b3(mdo sde): lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos lha
349b4(mdo sde): rnams dong bar rig nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
349b5(mdo sde): 'jam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gnod po chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsha 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang
349b6(mdo sde): ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'jo
349b7(mdo sde): bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di
350a1(mdo sde): skad ces kyang mchi'o// btsun pa 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'jam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / mang du mchi ba dang / bkren
350a2(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
350a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / thad du mchi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan
350a4(mdo sde): 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling
350a5(mdo sde): du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni daste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza ra'i nags su
350a6(mdo sde): shing u dum wa ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sbron cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag rba
350a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/ dper na mi stobs po che lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
350b1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
350b2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbran pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni daste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/
350b3(mdo sde): a bad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum wa ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang
350b4(mdo sde): ldan gyi 'dab/ a bad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum wa ra'i drung du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan der gshegs pa de'i tshe/ srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la
350b5(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'dus so// de nas der dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
350b6(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/ re zhig na gdugs tshod la bab pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang / lha'i zhal zas
350b7(mdo sde): bza' ba dang bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
351a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag la'ang bkur sti legs par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyam dang / khams dang / ra /
351a2(mdo sde): bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed
351a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
351a4(mdo sde): byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta
351a5(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la
351a6(mdo sde): mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i sku rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs
351a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des rdzus te skyes par gyur la/ 'dis sems bskyed pa'i mo la ci bsam pa dang / ci 'tshal ba de dag
351b1(mdo sde): thams cad grub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' nal/
351b2(mdo sde): bzhin 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyi sa las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
351b3(mdo sde): slong dag las byas shis bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
351b4(mdo sde): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal
351b5(mdo sde): pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la//
351b6(mdo sde): skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
351b7(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing gnas so// /
352a1(mdo sde): de nas re zhig na grong med pa dgon pa'i gnas shig na/ dge slong lnga dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal ta byas nas/
352a2(mdo sde): de dag gis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong cig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
352a3(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brten te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su
352a4(mdo sde): gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag rab tu byung ste/ yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis bdag brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par
352a5(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na/ des rdzus te skyes lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
352a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
352a7(mdo sde): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
352b1(mdo sde): 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma bu bcas
352b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu ba dang / des de'i sgra thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas/ lag pa oM tshugs
352b3(mdo sde): bcas te sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la/ ci nas bdag gis nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams
352b4(mdo sde): su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab gor ma chag snyam ste/ de ste de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsungs rab la rab tu byung nas des smon lam btab
352b5(mdo sde): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa 'dis na/ bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye bar gyur cig/ nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig
352b6(mdo sde): ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/
352b7(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa des ni rdzus te skyes par gyur to// des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las
353a1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
353a2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren
353a3(mdo sde): ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
353a4(mdo sde): stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
353a5(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang
353a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am tswi rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas
353a7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
353b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / spun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
353b2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya glo d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas ni shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa
353b3(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che po/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas// de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing
353b4(mdo sde): dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na
353b5(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig bcas nas/ de bcas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i
353b6(mdo sde): gnas thog zag mdzes par byas so// de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ 'di bces pa na
353b7(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gnas mdzes par byas pas mde'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gdags so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u mdzes pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ru ma
354a1(mdo sde): bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma mra gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar/
354a2(mdo sde): dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas gang gi tshe cher
354a3(mdo sde): skyes pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
354a4(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
354a5(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// de dga' ba bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos
354a6(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags
354a7(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nas khye'u mdzes pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs
354b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nges brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas/
354b2(mdo sde): phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i
354b3(mdo sde): chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang
354b4(mdo sde): bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes
354b5(mdo sde): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra
354b6(mdo sde): ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mdzes pas las gang dag bgyis na// des gzu
354b7(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob par gyur la/ 'di bcas pa'i tshe yang shin tu rmad du byung ba ma byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis grong khyer
355a1(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas kun tu mdzes par bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdzes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed
355a2(mdo sde): cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ mdzes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
355a3(mdo sde): gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las bsag shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang ka me'i khams dang ka rlung gi
355a4(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//
355a5(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
355a6(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
355a7(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med palha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du
355b1(mdo sde): byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho zang grong khyer mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas rgyas po mdzes pas de'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so// de nas re zhig na de'i dus ston/
355b2(mdo sde): zhig byung ba'i tshe/ mdza' sde dag cig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las// de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas dad pa skyes te/ me tog btags so// de dag gi nang na mdza' sde pa cig na re/
355b3(mdo sde): bdag la ni ci yang med kyi/ bdag ni ci yang mi byed do zhes zer nas/ mdza' sde de dag gi nang nas phyir byung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/ nges me tog rnam pa sna tshogs btus nas mchod rten de
355b4(mdo sde): nyid la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde pa 'gyod pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba
355b5(mdo sde): 'jig gi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag mdzes pas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon
355b6(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa des rang sangs rgyas nang pa zhig mthong ngo // de nas dad pa skyes te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bsod snyoms kyang
355b7(mdo sde): phul/ gos kyang phul lo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tsha dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi/
356a1(mdo sde): rings mi dbus po shing thun zhig tu gyur te/ de ri sul zhig tu shing byur song ba dang / des mchod rten zhig mthong na mchod rten de'i 'khor san rtswa dag kyang skyes so//
356a2(mdo sde): de nas de dad pa skyes nas/ des rtswa rnams kyang byung ste phyags ma thogs nas mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems
356a3(mdo sde): bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
356a4(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na dbul po shing thun du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes
356a5(mdo sde): pa 'di yin te/ des mchod rten dang ka mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags pa des na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to// rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra/
356a6(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar ba
356a7(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag
356b1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
356b2(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bam po nyi shu pa/
356b3(mdo sde): ka bi na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshang dpon rnams dang
356b4(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
356b5(mdo sde): bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
356b6(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / spun zong rnams brnyes
356b7(mdo sde): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lho phyogs na rgyal
357a1(mdo sde): po rtogs ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / mo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /
357a2(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/
357a3(mdo sde): bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas phyis re zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ btsun mo la bu
357a4(mdo sde): chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa las bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// de nas de btsas pa'i
357a5(mdo sde): btsas ston byas nas/ ka pi na zhes ming btags so// de nas khye'u ka pi na pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma
357a6(mdo sde): gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
357a7(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// gang gi nyin par rgyal po'i bu ka pi na bcas pa de kho na'i nyin par blon po khri brgyad stong gi bu yang btsas te/ thams cad kyang chen po che'i stobs dang
357b1(mdo sde): ldan pa sha stag go// de dag gi ming yang so so'i rkyen du 'tsham par btags so// de nas re zhig na rgyal po rtogs ldan shi nas de'i 'og tu bu ka pi na rgyal por bcug go// blon po'i bu khri brgyad stong po de dag/
357b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang blon por bskos so// de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po ka pi na blon po chen po khri brgyad stong gis zham ring byas te ri dgas gshor du song ba dang / des mdun logs dang / rgyab logs su dpung
357b3(mdo sde): chen po thams cad bltas nas/ blon po rnams la dris pa/ kA ye da ltar nga'i dpung chen po 'di lta bu dag gzhan su la yod ces byas so// de nas blon po snyan par smra ba rnams kyis/ g+ha su la
357b4(mdo sde): 'jam mchis so zhes byas so// de nas yul dbus nas tshong pa dag cig lce phyogs su song ba de dag gis rgyal po ka pi na chen po la skyes phul lo// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ kye tshang ba
357b5(mdo sde): dag yul de'i rgyal po su yin/ tshong pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ lha yul kha cig na ni mang po tshogs pa dbang bgyid do// yul kha cig na ni rgyal po dbang bgyid do// de nas re zhig na rgyal po ka
357b6(mdo sde): bi na chen pos mnyan du yod pa la sogs pa grong khyer chen po drug tu pho nya btang ste/ gal te khyed 'greng ba la bab pa na yang ma 'dug par myur du shog cig/ de ltar ma byas na chad pas cher gcad
